programme.title: ABC News Mornings (2024)
programme.desc: When big stories break, turn to Gemma Veness in the morning to bring you whats happening and why it matters. ABC News has more reporters in more places, serving and connecting communities and telling your stories.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon (2024)
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the days top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Fraction of the Cost
programme.desc: Want fabulous food for a fraction of the cost? Comedian Adam Spencer and Every Night Of The Weeks Lucy Tweed are with Adam to run the numbers.

programme.title: Strath Creek, VIC
programme.desc: Michael McCoy revisits a garden built after the owners lost their original property in a horror bushfire. (Season Final)

programme.title: The Birth of the Burbs (1945 -1960)
programme.desc: The end of WW2 marks the beginning of radical transformations to Australias housing landscape - social, cultural and architectural history is about to unfold in ways never before seen on this vast continent.

programme.title: Cambodia and Laos
programme.desc: Landline visits South-East Asia where a unique charity in Cambodia gives cows to farmers in return for sending their children to school. In Laos a dairys buffalo rental scheme is helping lift families out of poverty.

programme.title: Yumi Stynes
programme.desc: Yumi Stynes is a broadcaster, writer and mother-of-four whos carved out a 20-year media career through speaking her mind - while weathering social media storms along the way. She sits down with Jane Hutcheon.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing (2024)

programme.desc: Datuk Chef Wan menerokai kehidupan masyarakat setempat dari segi budaya, keunikkan dan juga pemandangan indah setiap lokasi yang diteriokainya

programme.desc: Memberi penghargaan kepada lagu-lagu pop Malaysia sepanjang zaman dari tahun 1930 hingga ke tahun 2010 untuk dipersembahkan oleh artis tempatan dalam bentuk akustik.

programme.desc: Rancangan memasak yang menguji suami selebriti mengenali masakan isterinya atau tidak. Isteri perlu memasak untuk suaminya tetapi dalam masa yang sama selebriti jemputan juga akan memasak menu yang sama.

programme.title: Arena Panas : Pro VS Bro S1
programme.desc: Bersama barisan atlit handal dan selebriti popular tanah air, sakasikan mereka berentap dalam acara sukan dan permainan menghiburkan anda.

programme.title: Life At Thinker
programme.desc: Life At Thinker adalah sebuah program vlog atau diari yang memaparkan aktiviti-aktiviti menarik dan kegilaan krew-krew Thinker Studios di sepanjang minggu.

programme.title: Isteri VS Tunang
programme.desc: Alana Sofea mencabar keegoan Zaim Azfar sehingga mereka berkahwin. Puas dapat menyahut cabaran Alana, Zaim kembali menjalin hubungan dengan bekas kekasihnya, Amira Irdina.

programme.title: Malaysian Sihir Stories
programme.desc: Perihal adik-beradik yang mempunyai deria keenam dan cuba menyelesaikan kes-kes berkaitan dengan sihir yang mengganggu orang di sekeliling mereka.

programme.title: Malam Tahlil Suhaila Balik
programme.desc: Dalam pada menanggung perit kematian Suhaila, suaminya berdepan dengan masalah yang tak disangka-sangka apabila mayat isterinya kembali ke rumah pada salah satu malam tahlilnya.

programme.title: Miss Lawak
programme.desc: Dihoskan oleh Dato Afdlin Shauki selain Erra Fazira and Dato AC Mizal sebagai juri tetap, siapakah di antara 18 gadis yang bakal merebut gelaran juara Miss Lawak 2019?

programme.title: Makhluk Manis Dalam Bis
programme.desc: Pertemuan pertama Emil dengan Gaby di dalam bas, seorang gadis manis misteri yang dia panggil Sweet Creatures. Sejak itu Emil berusaha mencari keberadaan Gaby, yang tinggal bersama datuknya.

programme.title: Expose Mistik: Kisah Seram
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan yang memaparkan kisah-kisah seram yang sangat mistik.

programme.title: Carca Marba
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan komedi yang pasti menghiburkan anda sekeluarga

programme.title: 27 Hari Mencari Mustafa
programme.desc: 10 tahun yang lepas, Mustafa menghilangkan diri setelah isterinya difitnah oleh ayahnya. Kini, ibunya tenat dan ayahnya terpaksa membuang egonya untuk mencari Mustafa di Chennai.

programme.title: M.A.I.D
programme.desc: Noorul meminta kerja sebagai orang gaji melalui agensi pekerjaan setelah kilang tempat kerjanya ditutup. Bermulalah episod Noorul sebagai orang gaji kepada anak Tan Sri yang sangat cerewet itu.

programme.title: Sepahtu Reunion Live 2023
programme.desc: Musim terbaharu, Jep, Rahim and Pak Ya serta tetamu jemputan pasti membuat anda tak kering gusi dengan punchline and pickupline mereka. Nantikan cameo yang bakal membuat anda terkejut di akhir rancangan.

programme.title: Fan Fanatik
programme.desc: Menampilkan dua pasukan yang terdiri daripada ahli kelab peminat selebriti tempatan bersaing di antara satu sama lain bagi mendapatkan takhta fan fanatik.

programme.title: RAI
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan yang memaparkan kisah-kisah masyarakat setempat

programme.title: Super Spontan Tepi Jalan
programme.desc: Saksikan rancangan komedi spontan yang pasti menghiburkan anda sekeluarga

programme.title: Ragam Cucu and Atuk
programme.desc: Dhia terpaksa tinggal bersama atuk and neneknya di kampung kerana ibu bapanya ke luar negara atas urusan kerja. Perkara itu amat mengujakan Dhia kerana dia suka untuk meluangkan masa bersama atuknya.

programme.title: Sukan Pejabat
programme.desc: Sebuah sitcom game show yang paling tidak adil di dunia dan memang tidak akan adil seperti realiti kehidupan di pejabat anda…mungkin?

programme.title: Girlfriend Aku Dari Neraka the Series
programme.desc: Kisah mengenai seorang jejaka bernama Rudi, yang merupakan seorang player dan sering kali bertukar teman wanita. Dia kemudian telah jatuh cinta dengan seorang gadis yang diidamkan. Pelbagai usaha telah dilakukan olehnya untuk memikat hati gadis tersebut dan dapatkah dia memihat hati gadis tersebut?

programme.title: Lawak Ke Dik?
programme.desc: Program untuk kanak-kanak bagi menyuarakan pendapat dan berkongsi buah fikiran mereka secara spontan.

programme.title: Kiah Pekasam
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang Kiah yang sangat jujur di dalam percakapannya memulakan kehidupan baru di kampungnya.

programme.title: Kiah Pekasam
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang Kiah yang sangat jujur di dalam percakapannya memulakan kehidupan baru di kampungnya.

programme.desc: Artis terpilih setiap minggu akan melakukan pelbagai aktiviti bersama bonda mereka. Saksikan detik istimewa mereka ini

programme.title: Selempang Kuning
programme.desc: Sebuah drama yang pasti menghiburkan anda sekeluarga

programme.title: Dalang Prank
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan hiburan prank yang melibatkan artis dan peserta yang menjadi dalang kepada prank masing-masing. Prank yang disukai oleh penonton akan dinobatkan Juara Dalang Prank dalam setiap episod.

programme.title: Jihan Show
programme.desc: Riuh rendah dibuatnya apabila Jihan berkumpul dengan teman-teman. Pelbagai topik jadi perbualan bila semua "girlfriends" bersatu.

programme.title: Makhluk Manis Dalam Bis
programme.desc: Pertemuan pertama Emil dengan Gaby di dalam bas, seorang gadis manis misteri yang dia panggil Sweet Creatures. Sejak itu Emil berusaha mencari keberadaan Gaby, yang tinggal bersama datuknya.

programme.title: Seminggu Sekali
programme.desc: Bersama Douglas Lim and Adibah Noor, saksikan mereka mengupas dan menyampaikan isu semasa kepada masyarakat secara santai dan lucu.

programme.title: Ngaroot Ngaroot
programme.desc: Sebuah sketsa yang menampilkan finalis MLM 2017 membawakan watak lucu yang bertemakan isu semasa. Selain itu, program ini turut memaparkan nilai murni dan pengajaran yang berguna buat penonton.

programme.title: Rick Steins Cornwall (S2)
programme.desc: In the final episode, Rick visits the Rame Peninsula. Far from the traditional tourist track, this part of Cornwall is famed for its cliffs and beaches. Rick also meets a beachcomber who has found some remarkable objects washed up on the shore. In mining country, Rick explores the history of the Cornish pasty and shows us how to cook them the proper Cornish way.

programme.title: Malaysia Gourmet With Justine Schofield (S1)
programme.desc: Justine discovers the lush flora of Penang at the tranquil Tropical Spice Garden and then devours a beloved local dish, the oyster omelette. She also visits Tegudon Tourism Village and makes a spicy Malaysian chicken curry with delicious purple rice.

programme.desc: When a quirky little stego finds more joy acting like a compy, Jon and Blitz have a hard time trying to get him to fit in with the stegosaurs.

programme.title: The Big Scoop
programme.desc: Apricot, the news guinea pig, enlists Mittens’ help to find the biggest story of the day.

programme.title: Cross That Bridge/ Knock Knock! Whos There?
programme.desc: The Martians accidentally break the train bridge over the ravine. Then, the Zee Mobile wont stop crashing into MacBarms barn door.

programme.title: Bams Upgrade/Ride Along
programme.desc: Bams new powers are stronger than he can control.

programme.title: Things That Go Bugs in the Night/Ducks Reflucks
programme.desc: Bugs must find the courage to discover whats making scary noises outside.

programme.desc: Mittens rides along with Fire Chief Grapefruit for the day.

programme.title: The Perfect Birthday/The Collection

programme.desc: Mush-Mush is amazed by how Mushpot uses his staff of wisdom.

programme.desc: Lilit lights up and stands in place of the Beacon Mushroom.

programme.title: Jungle Jam
programme.desc: In the Jungle, the Brave Bunnies meet Flou-Lou the LEMUR. He shows off his musical instrument: a bamboo fence with kitchen utensils tied to it.

programme.title: King Kalebs Mug
programme.desc: Yoyo invites all her friends to tea to meet her cousin. Kaleb is delighted but has a big problem - he cannot find his teacup.

programme.desc: inkey always finds Mumfie’s things when they are missing. She is so good at it that she decides to start a detective agency.

programme.desc: When the Tinhorns storm Dino Ranch digging for an emerald mine, Miguel and the Ranchers must protect the ranch from the troublesome prospectors.

programme.desc: Sylvester eats all of Grannys cookies then makes up a cookie monster to blame.

programme.desc: Pants teaches Mittens about burying bones! Mittens will never understand dogs.

programme.title: Outer Space/Snow Cap
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build a space station.

programme.title: The Tangra-Ribbits Song/The Big Laugh
programme.desc: The Tangranimals help the queen of the The Tangra-ribbits!

programme.title: Magnet Mayhem/Stop That Train
programme.desc: The magnet crane at the construction site sucks up all the metal, including the Mecha Builders! Then, a train pulls into the station and cant stop!

programme.title: Picture Perfect Park Party/Sun Block
programme.desc: Hero Celebration Day finishes with a slideshow of everyday heroes. Then, the situation gets slippery when the ice slide in the park begins to melt.

programme.title: Andy and the Walrus Pups
programme.desc: Andy heads out on an Arctic adventure to find out where walrus mothers nurse their pups.

programme.title: Lavender
programme.desc: Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers go on an eco quest to find out all about lavender.

programme.title: Head Scarf Calamity
programme.desc: Captain Captain decides to check that Sandy and Seaweeds pirate uniforms are clean, tidy and in perfect order. She is disappointed to discover that Seaweeds headscarf isnt up to scratch.

programme.title: The History Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels get an interactive history lesson from Duggee and a host of famous faces.

programme.title: The Sharing Badge
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels bake a pie and learn how to share by dividing things between them

programme.title: The Philosophy Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels think about lifes big questions, and gain their Philosophy badges.

programme.title: Giants Causeway, Northern Ireland
programme.desc: A Giant Grandmaster Glitch means BIG trouble for the Giants Causeway!

programme.title: The Wieliczka Salt Mine, Poland
programme.desc: The Go Jetters must save the famous salt statues in the Wieliczka Salt mine

programme.title: Panicky Percy
programme.desc: Percy causes confusion for everyone and prompts delays, when he spends too much time panicking over nothing.

programme.title: Mars As Moon
programme.desc: Mars tries to fill in for a missing Moon, but needs a little coaching from Sarah and Duck.

programme.title: Arcade Dance Off
programme.desc: Stumbling across an arcade, Sarah takes on a dancing challenge with John, whilst Duck and Flamingo team up to try and defeat a video game!

programme.title: Sand Monsters
programme.desc: Sand Monster Nelly and Sand Monster Nora love to knock down sand castles!

programme.title: Dog Loves Warm
programme.desc: The bookshop is cold so Dog and Pug go to the Antarctic to find out how animals keep warm.

programme.title: Best Bike in the World
programme.desc: When Monty gets a new bike, he must say goodbye to his old one. He wonders why you have to let go of things when you outgrow them.

programme.title: Its time to build a sandcastle
programme.desc: JoJo and Gran Gran go on a day-trip to the seaside to build a big sandcastle for Panda. But JoJo learns that things need not last forever to be special!

programme.title: Bedroom
programme.desc: Chilli and Bandit transform the old nursery into a new bedroom for Bluey. In the process, Bluey and Bingo amicably divide their belongings, but get absorbed by trading items and swapping notes at bedtime. Ultimately, when Bluey misses her sister, she asks to return to her old room.

programme.title: Obstacle Course
programme.desc: Chilli sets up an obstacle course in the backyard, but Bluey is disheartened when Bandit turns it into a race and beats her. After cheating in a rematch, Bluey discovers the importance of training in order to improve her skills.

programme.title: Promises
programme.desc: Bluey keeps breaking her promises! But after seeing how much Bingo trusts Mums word, Bluey learns the power of promises and why its important not to break them.

programme.title: The Future Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels are transported into the future where they encounter a robot Duggee!

programme.title: The Family Photo Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels learn that friends can be like an extended family.

programme.title: The Breakfast Badge
programme.desc: Tags feeling grumpy because he didnt eat his breakfast, uh-oh!

programme.title: The Dead Sea, Middle East
programme.desc: The Go Jetters are relaxing by the Dead Sea when Grandmaster Glitch causes a catastrophe.

programme.title: Raspberry
programme.desc: Raspberry sings a song, saying its cool to be kind.

programme.title: Pineapple
programme.desc: Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, its the magical Pineapple attempting to perform a very difficult magic trick with the help of Kiwi.

programme.title: Broccoli Alone
programme.desc: Supertato is out chasing a milkshake robot and leaves Broccoli in charge of Tato Tower. Evil Pea tries to take over the tower, but Broccoli puts on a great defence.

programme.title: Pea Repeats
programme.desc: Supertato is due to receive the Best Hero Award, but Evil Pea decides she should get it. Carrot tells her she needs to defeat herself to win the award.

programme.title: Footprints
programme.desc: Tinky Winky, Dipsy and Laa‐Laa follow a trail of muddy footprints and find Po in bed with very muddy feet. The Noo-Noo cleans off the mud.

programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say bubble and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of different bubbles - big bubbles, tiny bubbles, shiny bubbles and even bouncing bubbles!

programme.desc: Plom, Phoebe, Mae-Mae, Hooper, Zip, and Fly are a group of unique paper friends who live in Pop Paper City. They find new ways to have fun, such as playing pirates, building theme parks and even exploring outer space.

programme.title: Tastebuddies
programme.desc: Messy, a monster, explores science questions that children ask about the world around us. Someone pass Messy the tissues! He discovers that things just dont taste the same when he has a cold, especially his favourite chewy green socks - lets find out why.

programme.title: Giants Causeway, Northern Ireland
programme.desc: A Giant Grandmaster Glitch means BIG trouble for the Giants Causeway!

programme.title: The Wieliczka Salt Mine, Poland
programme.desc: The Go Jetters must save the famous salt statues in the Wieliczka Salt mine

programme.title: Panicky Percy
programme.desc: Percy causes confusion for everyone and prompts delays, when he spends too much time panicking over nothing.

programme.title: Mars As Moon
programme.desc: Mars tries to fill in for a missing Moon, but needs a little coaching from Sarah and Duck.

programme.title: Arcade Dance Off
programme.desc: Stumbling across an arcade, Sarah takes on a dancing challenge with John, whilst Duck and Flamingo team up to try and defeat a video game!

programme.title: Sand Monsters
programme.desc: Sand Monster Nelly and Sand Monster Nora love to knock down sand castles!

programme.title: Dog Loves Warm
programme.desc: The bookshop is cold so Dog and Pug go to the Antarctic to find out how animals keep warm.

programme.title: Best Bike in the World
programme.desc: When Monty gets a new bike, he must say goodbye to his old one. He wonders why you have to let go of things when you outgrow them.

programme.title: Its time to build a sandcastle
programme.desc: JoJo and Gran Gran go on a day-trip to the seaside to build a big sandcastle for Panda. But JoJo learns that things need not last forever to be special!

programme.title: Bedroom
programme.desc: Chilli and Bandit transform the old nursery into a new bedroom for Bluey. In the process, Bluey and Bingo amicably divide their belongings, but get absorbed by trading items and swapping notes at bedtime. Ultimately, when Bluey misses her sister, she asks to return to her old room.

programme.title: Obstacle Course
programme.desc: Chilli sets up an obstacle course in the backyard, but Bluey is disheartened when Bandit turns it into a race and beats her. After cheating in a rematch, Bluey discovers the importance of training in order to improve her skills.

programme.title: Promises
programme.desc: Bluey keeps breaking her promises! But after seeing how much Bingo trusts Mums word, Bluey learns the power of promises and why its important not to break them.

programme.title: The Future Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels are transported into the future where they encounter a robot Duggee!

programme.title: The Family Photo Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels learn that friends can be like an extended family.

programme.title: The Breakfast Badge
programme.desc: Tags feeling grumpy because he didnt eat his breakfast, uh-oh!

programme.title: The Dead Sea, Middle East
programme.desc: The Go Jetters are relaxing by the Dead Sea when Grandmaster Glitch causes a catastrophe.

programme.title: Raspberry
programme.desc: Raspberry sings a song, saying its cool to be kind.

programme.title: Pineapple
programme.desc: Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, its the magical Pineapple attempting to perform a very difficult magic trick with the help of Kiwi.

programme.title: Broccoli Alone
programme.desc: Supertato is out chasing a milkshake robot and leaves Broccoli in charge of Tato Tower. Evil Pea tries to take over the tower, but Broccoli puts on a great defence.

programme.title: Pea Repeats
programme.desc: Supertato is due to receive the Best Hero Award, but Evil Pea decides she should get it. Carrot tells her she needs to defeat herself to win the award.

programme.title: Feeling Better
programme.desc: Its time to wake up but Tinky Winky isnt feeling well. Soon, Tinky Winky feels better but now Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dont feel well.

programme.title: Cat
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say cat and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! Theres a black cat, a white cat, a kitten cat and a purring cat, as well as a very cool cat!

programme.title: Snow Day
programme.desc: Phoebe and her friends are enjoying a Pop Paper City winter wonderland! But can Phoebe help to make a snowman before a snowstorm arrives?

programme.title: Messys Lost Balloon
programme.desc: Messy, a monster, explores science questions that children ask about the world around us. Messy loves balloons, whatever colour they are, but what is inside them to make them float up high into the sky?

programme.title: Omelette
programme.desc: Bingo is helping Mum make an omelette for Dads birthday breakfast, but cracking eggs is harder than it looks, and Dad is getting hungrier by the minute.

programme.title: Born Yesterday
programme.desc: Dad pretends he was born yesterday. Bluey and Bingo have to guide him through his second day on Earth, especially when he discovers food is delicious and steals Luckys Dads pie.

programme.title: The List Badge
programme.desc: Duggee has lost the list he made for the Squirrels activities for the day at Squirrel Club. After a quick lesson on what a list is, they are happy to help Duggee recreate his.

programme.title: The Wish Badge
programme.desc: Whilst helping Duggee clean up, the Squirrels come across an old lamp. Duggee explains that many years ago, when rubbed, it could grant three magical wishes.

programme.title: The Size Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels learn about atoms, molecules and cells to help understand sizing when they try to sort a line-up of things from smallest to biggest.

programme.title: Lake Retba, Senegal
programme.desc: The team gets all shook up when Glitch sucks up the pink water of Senegals Milkshake Lake.

programme.title: Waitomo Glowworm Caves, New Zealand
programme.desc: Its not a good day to be a glow-worm, when Grandmaster Glitch goes in search of some disco sparkles in New Zealand. Can the Go Jetters stop him?

programme.title: Helicopter
programme.desc: At school, Bluey and her friends turn a tree stump into a thrilling game of Helicopter. But as the pilot, Bluey has to learn to give up some control, so they can all have fun.

programme.title: Flatpack
programme.desc: While Mum and Dad struggle to build new flat-pack furniture, Bluey and Bingo transform the empty boxes into their own new world.

programme.title: Andy and the Common Octopus
programme.desc: Andy blasts off in his safari-sub to the coast of South Africa in search of an octopus.

programme.title: Soil
programme.desc: Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers go on an eco quest to find out all about soil.

programme.title: Captain Captains Classic Clips
programme.desc: Squawk takes us on a journey to find Captain Captains top Swashbuckle moments, her classic clips, which are all hidden along a pirate treasure map.

programme.title: The Art Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels learn about different types of art and what inspires it.

programme.title: The History Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels get an interactive history lesson from Duggee and a host of famous faces.

programme.title: The Sharing Badge
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels bake a pie and learn how to share by dividing things between them

programme.title: The Golden Gate Bridge, USA
programme.desc: On a very foggy day, The Golden Gate Bridges foghorns are missing. Can the Go Jetters help?

programme.desc: Monty and Gran do some painting, and Monty wonders whether all paintings have to look like the things being painted.

programme.desc: The Squirrels are transported into the future where they encounter a robot Duggee!

programme.title: The Family Photo Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels learn that friends can be like an extended family.

programme.title: The Forbidden City, China
programme.desc: Some runaway Chinese drums roll towards The Forbidden City. Can the Go Jetters stop them?

programme.title: Tomato
programme.desc: Live from the Roots and Fruits Theatre, Tomato changes colour.

programme.title: Raspberry
programme.desc: Raspberry sings a song, saying its cool to be kind.

programme.title: Pea Repeats
programme.desc: Supertato is due to receive the Best Hero Award, but Evil Pea decides she should get it. Carrot tells her she needs to defeat herself to win the award.

programme.title: Da Veggie Code
programme.desc: Supertatos Tato belt gets locked inside a glass case for an exhibition, but Tomato cant remember the code to get it out again, and Supertato needs it back to defeat Evil Pea.

programme.title: Cold
programme.desc: Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po are outside in the cold when they spot the Tiddlytubbies who are warm, inside. The Teletubbies put on hats, gloves and scarves to keep warm.

programme.title: Tummy
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say tummy and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see a furry tummy, a squeaky tummy, some silly tummies and a tickly tummy.

programme.title: Zips Movie
programme.desc: As everyone else gets their films ready for a big movie night, Zip still doesnt know what his film should be about. He wonders whether he will have a film to show at movie night after all.

programme.title: Float or Sink
programme.desc: Captain Messy plays pirates with his toys in a bowl of water, but why does his rubber duck float instead of sink?

programme.title: Born Yesterday
programme.desc: Dad pretends he was born yesterday. Bluey and Bingo have to guide him through his second day on Earth, especially when he discovers food is delicious and steals Luckys Dads pie.

programme.title: Mini Bluey
programme.desc: When Dad complains about how dissimilar Bluey and Bingo are, Bluey hatches a plan to make them more alike and happily introduces Mini-Bluey!

programme.title: The Music Video Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels are having fun playing a song they made, but they wish that they could see themselves perform. Duggee has a great suggestion, and they learn how to be creative.

programme.title: The List Badge
programme.desc: Duggee has lost the list he made for the Squirrels activities for the day at Squirrel Club. After a quick lesson on what a list is, they are happy to help Duggee recreate his.

programme.title: The Wish Badge
programme.desc: Whilst helping Duggee clean up, the Squirrels come across an old lamp. Duggee explains that many years ago, when rubbed, it could grant three magical wishes.

programme.title: Gordon Gets the Giggles
programme.desc: Gordon becomes very worried when he gets a serious case of the giggles. He must find a way to control his laughter before it does any damage.

programme.title: Rainbow Race
programme.desc: The changeable weather means Rainbow has to leave before finishing his story. Sarah and Duck try to find out how the story ends.

programme.title: Donkey Jump

programme.title: Frozen
programme.desc: The pond has frozen over so Nelly and Nora help the ducks find the water again.

programme.title: Dog Loves Mysteries
programme.desc: On a foggy day in London Dog and Pug meet up with Sherlock Holmes and Watson. They all become separated in the heavy fog. Pugs ingenious plan helps them all to find each other and solve their mysteries.

programme.title: The Nights Alright
programme.desc: Even though it is bedtime, Monty and Jimmy Jones arent tired and Monty wonders if the night is really just for sleeping.

programme.title: Its time to put on a show
programme.desc: JoJo doesnt know what to do with her odd socks, so Gran Gran suggests they put on a puppet show! The two of them turn the socks into puppets, ready for a show in the garden.

programme.title: Promises
programme.desc: Bluey keeps breaking her promises! But after seeing how much Bingo trusts Mums word, Bluey learns the power of promises and why its important not to break them.

programme.title: Komodo National Park, Indonesia
programme.desc: When Grandmaster Glitch supersizes a fierce Komodo dragon, the Go Jetters must act fast!

programme.title: The Golden Gate Bridge, USA
programme.desc: On a very foggy day, The Golden Gate Bridges foghorns are missing. Can the Go Jetters help?

programme.title: Martial Arts of Shaolin
programme.desc: Zhi Ming, who trains at the Northern Shaolin Temple, teams up with Si Ma Yan, who trains at the Southern Shaolin Temple, to avenge both their fathers death by assassinating a corrupt magistrate, leading to a series of fierce battles!

programme.title: The Twin Bracelets
programme.desc: Two teenage girls make a pledge to look after each other in a small Chinese fishing town, where the notions of womens rights or sexual freedom are absent. One ends up happily married to a stranger, while the other is cruelly betrothed to the abusive son of a wealthy family and has to seek to free herself from the situation.

programme.title: Shaolin Intruders
programme.desc: On a routine courier mission, the prestigious Chief was murdered by four mysterious monks. When all evidence pointed to Ching Hua, his friend Lei decides to clear his name by barging in the Shaolin Temple thrice. When Lei thought justice was served for the culprits, he soon realizes the table had turned and the monks stroke again. What follows is a series of intense pursuit for the ultimate villain!

programme.title: The Comedy of Mismatches
programme.desc: Two pairs of lovers got mismatched accidentally. The man disguises as a woman for his sisters wedding ceremony, while his lover disguises as a man to marry another woman. After the marriage mismatches are revealed, the lovers and their families are taken to court, where Prefecture Chief Qiao manages to work out a happy ending.

programme.title: Heaven and Hell
programme.desc: When an angel, Ling, decides to help his two friends who have fallen in love to escape from Heaven, he is sent to live as a human on earth as his punishment. Reincarnated as a cab driver, he sacrifices his own life to save another ill-fated couple and lands in hell, where he has to face off against the ghosts and demons to fight his way out!

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical comedy is about how a young man Fen, along with his buddy Hamburger, finds love and success in the advertising world.

programme.title: Clan Of The White Lotus
programme.desc: The head of White Lotus Clan, Lo, is a highly skilled martial artist who supports the Qing government and helps destroy the rebellion group. Hung from Shaolin who kills Los brother, is being hunted and hides in another rebel Hus house. The clan attacks at night killing Hu and his sister, but Hung manages to get Hus pregnant wife to safety.

programme.title: The Lark
programme.desc: Sixties pop star Carrie Ku plays the "Little Lark" in this romantic-drama of mistaken identity that is a treasure trove of some of the most popular Mandarin songs of all time.

programme.title: The Sword of Swords
programme.desc: The Sword Master passes on his sword to his disciple Lin before he dies. Another disciple Fang also eyes the sword and plots to take it away from Lin, destroying his family and blinding him in the process. Lin finally battles Fang for revenge and vows to reclaim his sword.

programme.title: Black Magic
programme.desc: Hsu Lo is up against an evil black magic practitioner San Kan Mi, who wants to place a death spell on him and a love spell on his fiancee Wang Chu Ying. Fortunately, Wangs friends manage to find another veteran witch doctor to take on the evil San. This bone-chilling tale of good versus evil races to a heart-stopping ending.

programme.title: Killers On Wheels
programme.desc: Kuo takes his family to an outlying island of Hong Kong for a vacation. On the ferry, they meet a group of young hooligans cum motorcyclists called the "speed gang

programme.title: The Devils Mirror
programme.desc: A power-hungry Witch who leads the Bloody Ghouls Clan, seeks two magical mirrors, Wind Mirror and Thunder Mirror, which are owned by Bai and the Wen Clan respectively. She needs both mirrors to find the location of a powerful weapon that will make her invincible and will stop at nothing to get her hands on them.

programme.title: Invincible Shaolin
programme.desc: An evil Qing general comes up with a plan to rid the Shaolin masters once and for all. He invites three Northern Shaolin experts to fight against three Southern Shaolin disciples. After the contest, the general secretly kills the Southerners and places the blame on the Northerners. This leads to in-fighting between both Shaolin schools.

programme.title: Duel For Gold
programme.desc: Six swordsmen, including two sisters and their husbands, a ranger and a security man, are trying to steal a million gold taels from the Fu Lai Treasury House, not knowing that one of them is actually an undercover hero. In their quest, they have to double-cross and outwit one another...

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: Clans of Intrigue
programme.desc: Heroic outlaw Chu Liu Xiang is dining with his friend Monk Wu Hua, when Gong from the Holy Water Palace appears and accuses Chu of stealing the holy water from her Palace and using it for various murders. Chu denies, and is given a month to find the murderer or be killed by Gong. To prove his innocence, Chu decides to investigate the case...

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: Little Hero
programme.desc: An orphan, Little Bastard is taken on and trained as a fighter by a hermit. When Little Bastard grows up, he feels he is old enough to go out and look for his parents. Luckily for him, he befriends a beggar, Hsiao Yi, who being street-wise, manages to help him find his family, but somehow gets into trouble with the gang.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Three young kung-fu warriors from wildly different backgrounds become students of Shaolin at the same temple. These three warriors are: Royal Guard Lo Lieh, fleeing soldier, Lo Meng, and villager, Wang Yu.

programme.title: Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Wei Chun is a cocky young man sentenced to jail for killing a man in a fight. One day, Wei Chun picks a fight with a seemingly defenseless old man who completely thrashes him! The old man turns out to be the master of monkey style kung fu and as they become friends, he gives Wei Chun half of a medallion that would direct him to hidden secrets.

programme.title: The Singing Escort
programme.desc: Betty Ting plays Susan, a young woman hiding from her father by being a nightclub singer in Japan. Pop singer Chao Ke-jen (Lin Chong) gets permission from his boss to visit Japan, with the condition that he finds the bosss daughter. Boy finds girl, boy falls in love. But will the father approve?

programme.title: Return of Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A band of ninjas slaughters the entire Wu Dang Clan and frames Du Gu Wu Di, chief of the Invincible Clan, for the deed. Yun masters the silkworm martial arts style and decides to take revenge for the Clan by challenging Wu Di, but is defeated and seriously hurt. Luckily, Master Li saves and treats him, allowing Yun to avoid the ninjas pursuit.

programme.title: The Fantastic Magic Baby
programme.desc: The story is about the legendary Monkey King (Liu Chung-chun) teams up with Goddess of Mercy (Chao Li-chuan) and the Dragon Girl (Lung Nu) to battle the child god Hung Hai-erh (Ting Hua-chung),son of the Ox Demon (Hung Hai-erh) to rescue Tang Tseng, the Holy Pilgrim (Teng Chio-jen).

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: Hsieh Choun, the Black Dragon, is in trouble with the police since Wang Sien Tiens gang is helping them; he is no longer free to conduct his drugs shipments out of the port freely as he used to. He buys more thugs and killers to dispose of the young upstart, and soon Wang is in dire straits, in the port of Hong Kong.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung and the Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperors sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: Illicit Desire
programme.desc: This instant cult classic adapts three erotic and mystical tales from the Chinese classical works, with stories spanning across time from the Tang to Ming dynasties. The stories, filled with characters such as emperors, concubines, monks and fortune-tellers, intertwine in a world of adultery, lust and greed, alongside great costumes!

programme.title: Disciples Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Yi is a skilled disciple of the Hong Quan style kung fu who work in a textile mill recommended by his senior, Han. Han warns Yi not to show off his martial arts skill so as to avoid getting into trouble. However, Yi does not listen and eventually gets dangerously involved in the conflict between two opposing textile mills.

programme.title: Demon of the Lute
programme.desc: Lute demon Chin Mo has reappeared in the world to wreak havoc. Hsiao Feng Ling is ordered to help find a special bow and arrows that can counter the demon. Only Chiao Yin knows the whereabouts of the weapon. Hsiao and her classmate Old Naughty set out on an arduous journey to find Chiao. After overcoming many obstacles, they catch Chin Mos man trying to snatch the bow and manage to stop him in time....

programme.title: Call to Arms
programme.desc: The aggressive and dangerous Chin Empire conquers the hard-put Chao kingdom while the Wei empire is drained of its heroes and paralyzed by an indecisive ruler. Adventure, intrigue, death and tragedy reigns before the triumphant clash of the armies.

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: The Bloody Escape
programme.desc: Ku is a skilled Kung Fu artist brought up by the bandits and does not agree with the brutal leader of the bandits camp. He rescues Tong, a young lady forced to become the leaders wife, causing both the authorities and bandits to come after them. Ku has to stand up against the bandits that he grew up with so as to start a new life for himself.

programme.title: The Warlord
programme.desc: A bandit became a warlord in northern China by helping Russia fight against Japan. Due to his ignorance and silly behaviour, he is seen as a joke to everyone. The warlord is finally killed by the daughter of a troupe master whom he had killed for no reason, bringing a befitting end to a traitor.

programme.title: Men From The Monastery
programme.desc: At the end of the Ming Dynasty, Wu San Gui betrays his people to the Qing officials and recruits fighters from all backgrounds. Members from Wudan and Ermei are the first to yield and collude with local bullies. When they start attacking the Shaolin Monastery, its most famous disciples have to band together and fight against the enemies.

programme.title: Fangs of the Cobra
programme.desc: Incredibly, the title serpent is not a harbinger of horror, but actually the films hero. This virtuous viper sniffs out bombs, fights gangs, battles a baby-killing rodent and even takes on a duplicitous woman. This one-of-a-kind thriller will be applauded by reptile fans everywhere.

programme.title: The Sword Stained with Royal Blood
programme.desc: Adapted from Jin Yongs novel, the movie depicts the havoc breaking out in the martial arts world when a warrior on the run uncovers a sword, a training manual, a treasure map and a secret message on the body of a deceased martial arts master.

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriends baby...

programme.title: Magnificent Wanderers
programme.desc: Lin and his two friends are traveling patriots who vow to stand up against violence and fight for justice. They meet a rich young man Chu by chance one day and the four become best friends. When a foreign prince plots to possess Chus family fortune and goes after him, Lin and friends go all out to help Chu fight against the villain.

programme.title: Global News
programme.desc: Be updated with the latest news developments around the world.

programme.title: Chinas Public Opinion Field
programme.desc: This programme brings media professionals, commentators and online opinion leaders into the studio to express views on current issues.

programme.title: China News
programme.desc: China News focuses on the latest news and social changes happening in China as well as all over the world.

programme.title: Focus Today
programme.desc: Focus Today traces current affairs from China and the world.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Ma Wing Jing and his brother arrive in Shanghai to make their fortune. Befriending a powerful mobster Tam, Ma is given his nightclub when he saves Tams life. Mas fortune rises but he must overcome the corruption and violence to survive.

programme.title: The Gambling Ghost
programme.desc: Sammo Hung plays three roles: Fatty, Fattys father and grandfather. Hoping to become rich, hotel staff Fatty dives into gambling with his friend to the dismay of his father. When Fatty hits rock bottom, his grandfathers ghost appears to help him. As Fatty finds out that his grandfather was murdered, he vows to avenge his death.

programme.title: Long Arm of the Law Part 3
programme.desc: Chinese ex-soldier Li is wrongly accused and seeks refuge in Hong Kong to escape a death sentence. En route, he meets Sam and Moon. While Li has fallen in love with Moon, Hong Kong triad kidnaps Moon and coerces Li into aiding a robbery. Meanwhile, the mainland police officer tracks Lis path to Hong Kong, intensifying the chase.

programme.title: Chungking Express
programme.desc: Two Hong Kong urban love stories depicting two Hong Kong policemen, both jilted by ex-lovers and falling in love again. One falls for a mysterious female underworld figure while the other is in love with a beautiful and witty server at a fast food restaurant he frequents.

programme.title: Prince Charming
programme.desc: Chen Li Pin, the nerdy son of a business tycoon, and his friend seek love in Hawaii. Returning home in disappointment, they accidentally find themselves in a messy identity swap. It is at this time that Chen falls for a beautiful girl May, who thinks he is a company chauffeur...

programme.title: The Story of Woo Viet
programme.desc: Former Vietnamese veteran Woo Viet arrives a refugee camp in Hong Kong and meets his pen pal Quan. Subsequently, he encounters Shum Ching, with whom he attempts to flee to the US. However, the pair end up stranded in Manilas Chinatown, where at the hands of the local triads Woo becomes a hired killer, while Shum is forced into prostitution.

programme.title: Heart of Dragon
programme.desc: A cop, Tat, forsakes his dream of becoming a sailor to take care of his mentally disabled brother, Danny. When Danny steals from a gangster by accident and gets kidnapped, Tat must turn over a key police witness in order to save him. Left with no choice, Tat has to abduct the witness and fight the gangsters until he gets Danny back.

programme.title: Beauty And The 7 Beasts
programme.desc: Teddy, once a renowned movie star, is facing a career decline. To make a living, he accepts five disciples to shape them into stars. Teddys career regains momentum after he reunites with his long-lost daughter, but he is also confronted by a rival at the same time. His daughter and disciples decide to help him overcome this difficult situation...

programme.title: Feel 100% 2003
programme.desc: Based on the popular comic book of the same name, Jerry and Lok are two best buddies with a common goal of finding their perfect girlfriend. Neither of them has ever encountered anything close to their "100% girl

programme.title: Dragon Tiger Gate
programme.desc: Adapted from a famous Hong Kong comic, Tiger Wong is ambushed after he unwittingly took the Lousha Plaque but is saved by his brother Dragon Wong. They also befriended Turbo Shek during the fight and the trio forms a brotherhood. To avenge the death of the Dragon Gate masters, they train and vow to defeat Shibumi, the leader of Lousha Clan.

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: Winner Takes All
programme.desc: Swindler Master Wong has cheated Paulines father of his lifetime savings and Pauline vows to bring him to justice. On the way to find Wong, Pauline befriends a young conman and teams up with him to set up a perfect plot to scam Wong. Will their plan succeed and can she uphold justice in the end?

programme.title: Mother VS Mother
programme.desc: Guan De Xing fell in love with Li Xiao Yun when he was young, but was opposed by his mother and had to marry Zhou Shen Yu. Since then, Li holds a grudge against Zhou. Unfortunately, the son of Guan and Zhou falls in love with Lis daughter, and as the two mothers meet, they start brawling again!

programme.title: Behind the Yellow Line
programme.desc: A fresh graduate, Paul, strikes up an acquaintance with a pretty young girl, Monica, on the metro. Monica is involved in a love affair with a married man while Paul is also pursued by a rich girl. When Paul vows his true love for Monica, she suggests playing hide-and-seek with him in the metro to decide if they are fated to be together.

programme.title: The Sparrow
programme.desc: Kei is an experienced "Sparrow

programme.title: The Eye 2
programme.desc: Joey looks to start a new life after a failed suicide attempt but finds herself pregnant and dare not tell her ex-boyfriend. At the same time, she realizes that a mysterious woman is stalking her and begins to hallucinate, leading to a nervous breakdown. Taking advice from an abbot, Joey decides to uncover the truth in order to protect her baby...

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 3
programme.desc: Gambling tycoon Man suddenly marries his new partner Sophie, which shocked his only son, Ken. In the wake of Mans heart attack, Ken must battle Sophie - who has persuaded Man to transfer his grand master title to her in the event of his death - for the rightful claim to the familys gambling business in a riveting game of mahjong.

programme.title: Seven Swords
programme.desc: Seven warriors of exceptional swordsmanship band together to protect a village from an evil general in this exciting martial arts film.

programme.title: My Wife is 18
programme.desc: Cheung, a dull thirty-year-old man, gets married in the UK to lovely YoYo, who is just eighteen, so as to fulfil their parents wishes. Back in Hong Kong, their relationship is that of an assumed couple, as well as a teacher and student. With contradictions and funny incidents governing their relationship, the two gradually fall in love...

programme.title: The Medallion
programme.desc: Hong Kong cop Eddie is hired by the Interpol to capture a human smuggling gang leader known as Snakehead. Eddie dies in an action to protect a sacred child from being kidnapped, but is brought back to life by the childs magical medallion, allowing him to finally kill Snakehead.

programme.title: July Rhapsody
programme.desc: A 40-year-old high school teacher is in midlife crisis. His marriage is on the rocks and he is involved in a taboo romance with a female student who has a crush on him. Meanwhile, his wife is off to care for her dying ex-lover who shares a complicated history with the couple...

programme.title: Fallen Angels
programme.desc: The funkier cousin to Chungking Express, director Wong Kar Wai looks at five fallen angels who suffer love and loss amidst the crime and chaos of Hong Kongs neon nights in this movie. Karen Mok won Best Supporting Actress in the 15th Hong Kong Film Awards for her remarkable role as a broken-hearted party girl.

programme.title: Mahjong Heroes
programme.desc: A hero helps a young student deflect a cunning and malicious gambling tycoon who is out to take over the students family business over a game of mahjong.

programme.title: Hong Kong Hong Kong
programme.desc: After moving to Hong Kong, illegal immigrant Mang has no choice but to live in cramped quarters with male migrants who abuse her. In order to attain Hong Kong residency and a better life, she agrees to marry a lonely old carpenter. After her marriage, Mang crosses paths again with her ex-lover, and the two develop a passionate affair...

programme.title: In Laws, Out Laws
programme.desc: When priceless antiques were found in the backyard of Auntie Kangs home, the family finds themselves becoming sudden millionaires. Their arguments and disagreements lead to hilarious results as each of Auntie Kangs sons tries his darnedest to get the biggest shares!

programme.title: Doubles Cause Troubles
programme.desc: Two squabbling cousins find themselves in more trouble than they can imagine after their tenant ends up dead. The gangsters and the police are both after them, and they have no idea what they have done wrong!

programme.title: Armour of God
programme.desc: Jackie, the Asian Hawk, steals treasures from remote places and resells them at a good price. He finds the mysterious and legendary "Armour of God" and sells it to the Earl. When terrorists kidnap his ex-girlfriend Laura in exchange for the "Armour of God

programme.title: Justice, My Foot!
programme.desc: Chow stars as Sung, a lawyer who uses any means necessary to help his wealthy clients escape the law. Sung retires to the countryside when urged by his wife, but when Mrs Sung encounters a woman whose husbands death has been covered up by corrupted officials, Sung returns to the court for justice to be served.

programme.title: The Truth
programme.desc: Orphaned lawyer Raymond Lau once helped clear hooker Lan of murder charges, not knowing that Lan is his mother. When a corrupt cop blackmails Lan with Raymonds identity, she kills him out of desperation. When Raymond is enlisted again to defend Lan, he uncovers the secret that she has been hiding about their relationship for years.

programme.title: I Love Lolanto
programme.desc: Lolanto, a playboy, is injured and meets the daughter of a tycoon, Man, in the hospital. Man is mentally retarded and makes friends easily with Lolanto hence Mans father hires him to take care of her. However, as Man goes through treatments and recovers, her feelings for Lolanto also changes...

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the "Gang of Five" in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: Wonder Women
programme.desc: This is the story about a career woman and her friend going through life with their resilience and perseverance during the highs and lows of the Hong Kong economy over a decade, from the Handover in 1997 through 2007.

programme.title: Dry Wood Fierce Fire
programme.desc: Alice works for a womens magazine and falls for Ryan, who is hired to run the mens magazine, both owned by magazine tycoon Michelle. Ryan only has eyes for Michelle and Alice tries to hide her true feelings to help him win Michelle.

programme.title: Bullet and Brain
programme.desc: Nine years ago, two legendary criminals, Bullet and Brain, vowed not to kill and lie before they disappeared. Both now return for a mission - to protect the granddaughter of the triad boss. Can they succeed without breaking their vows?

programme.title: How to Pick Girls Up !
programme.desc: Xin, a helpless loser in love, calls in to a radio show hosted by DJ Tsang to ask desperately for help. A self-proclaimed love expert, Tsang takes it upon himself to make sure Xin meets girls and leads him on a series of absurd excursions into the wild and dangerous world of modern love.

programme.title: Kung Fu Dunk
programme.desc: Shi Jie grew up in a martial arts school and possesses an extraordinary shooting skill. Street hustler Chen Li sees his talent and arranges for him to join a university basketball team. With his kung fu dunking skill, Shi Jie manages to win all college basketball matches, bringing him wealth and also strengthening his relationship with Chen Li.

programme.title: A Chinese Tall Story
programme.desc: While finding ways to rescue his disciples, Monk Tripitaka meets the lizard imp Mei Yan, the ugliest woman alive. Despite the conflict between good and evil, he falls for Mei Yan who sacrifices herself to save him many times. The Monk breaks his "no killing" rule to save his disciples, and things get more complicated as Princess Galaxy appears...

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Inheritors
programme.desc: Inheritors is a multi-media product from CGTN that shines a light on China’s rich Intangible Cultural Heritage. Each 30-minute TV edition is hosted by a long-term expatriate in China who has a unique understanding of the country’s culture. He or she will introduce viewers to people who are dedicating their lives to its protection, inheritance, innovation, development and promotion.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTNs brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the worlds most powerful laser and the worlds smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. _x000D_An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occams Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one.

programme.title: Travelogue
programme.desc: Travelogue is a 30-minute travel program. Through the journeys of our intrepid hosts, we experience the beauty, culture and mystery of China, discovering how people live in this vast country and showcasing Chinas transformation to the world._x000D__x000D__x000D_

programme.title: Sports Scene
programme.desc: Sports Scene brings you closer to all the action from all corners of the world, with highlights from across Europe, North America and Chinas top sports leagues. We examine the changes and growth in Chinas domestic leagues, as the country undergoes an incredible economic transformation.

programme.title: The Point with Liu Xin
programme.desc: The Point with LIU Xin is a current affairs program on CGTN. The program comments on global news through LIU Xin’s very own unique perspective. With two decades of experience as a news anchor and overseas correspondent, LIU Xin has an engaging and personal style. The Point with LIU Xin connects world audience through social media, enhancing their participation as well as offering a comprehensive perspective on world events.

programme.title: Global Watch
programme.desc: GLOBAL WATCH is a 60 minute-long news program. The show stresses Chinese elements, emphasizing China’s perspective, policies and stories. The program, relying on global reporting resources, presents in-depth analysis and coverage of major global issues, from a Chinese perspective on international affairs. The program presents to-the-point interpretation of Chinese policies and stories that are of interest to foreign audiences, in a style they are familiar with.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. Global Business shows you whats moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: The Vibe
programme.desc: The Vibe is a 30-minute TV show that runs daily on weekdays on CGTN. The content focuses on exciting new trends, fashion, and cultural topics across a range of disciplines both in China and abroad. The host presents various culture-related topics in a fun way while also doing some in-depth analysis to give viewers a fuller picture as to what is happening, and why it matters.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. Local correspondents and local production teams provide authoritative and in-depth stories from across the region. Africa Live is an objective and comprehensive look at every facet of African life.

programme.title: Asia Today
programme.desc: Asia Today highlights the latest news and social developments across Asia. Correspondents in over a dozen countries report on the region’s top stories as they happen. Analysts bring Asian perspective to topical and developing issues. Asia Today also emphasizes the diverse cultures and lifestyles of the world’s most populous continent.

programme.title: Dialogue
programme.desc: Dialogue is a prime time daily English talk show on CGTN. The 30-minute talk show covers a wide range of domestic and international topics, providing a balanced and critical perspective on current affairs and analysis within the framework of cross-cultural and multi-disciplinary comparisons. Inviting decision makers in government, business and academia onto the show, the host encourages guests to speak their minds frankly.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: China 24
programme.desc: China 24 is a prime time news program featuring in-depth reports and analysis of the stories in the headlines in China. Produced by CGTN’s studios in Beijing and Washington D.C., the show takes a compelling and comprehensive look at China. It explores the country’s business, politics, technology, culture, entertainment and more. China 24 tackles head-on the issues that matter most to the nation and its people, with topical reports highlighting challenges facing this fast-changing country.

programme.title: Episode 6: Hawker(English/Chinese Subtitles)
programme.desc: Hawker centres hold a special place in Singapores unique identity - a place not only for sustenance but social cohesion. programme.title: Us Squawk On The Street
programme.desc: Headquartered live on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) where the biggest companies in the world trade, "Squawk On The Street" tracks the action of every stock and gives you access to the treasury, currency and commodity action in real time. programme.desc: The tire track found at the Donna Bennett Johnston crime scene provided police with a long list of potential suspects, everyone in the Baton Rouge area who had purchased an Aquatred tire.

programme.desc: In a revealing conversation, Tanya recounts the horror of the 10 years she spent in captivity in her predators bedroom, and confides in Elizabeth about the realities of grooming.

programme.desc: When an infants body washes up on the shores of Deer Island, Massachusetts, residents rally to find out who she is, and what happened to her. Their unprecedented solidarity gets nationwide attention.

programme.title: Court Cam: Top 10 Moments Of 2021
programme.desc: A countdown of the top 10 moments of 2021 on Court Cam.

programme.title: The Pickup Truck Killer
programme.desc: Chamlong Nirut Sornkamharn worked the highways of Thailand, hiring men as truck drivers, poisoning them to death and stealing their cars. Was he working for car traffickers or a serial killer?

programme.title: Machete Attacker Or Innocent Girlfriend?
programme.desc: A heated argument turns terrifying as a woman is threatened by her boyfriend. Waiting at a gas station after calling 911, she grabs a machete to defend herself.

programme.title: Neighbor From Hell
programme.desc: A mans body is found in a wooded area and the victims neighbour is brought into the interrogation room, where evidence mounts even as hes being interviewed.

programme.title: Nightmare In New England
programme.desc: Maine is brought to its knees when its most popular teen turns up dead. With the help of a dedicated mother and a community that never forgets, the secret killer is finally exposed.

programme.title: Friday Night Ghosts
programme.desc: In late 1983, the bodies of five people abducted from a local restaurant are found murdered. The main suspect was believed to be a well-connected local man, until new evidence reveals the true killers.

programme.title: Busted By Blueberries
programme.desc: A man finds himself in jail over stolen blueberries, and a woman who has spent her life running from the law decides to surrender in hopes of making amends with her son.

programme.title: Its All A Mistake
programme.desc: Speed Racers and a diplomat charge their way into jail while a jealous boyfriend fights his way in. A hungry, homeless man makes a regrettable decision.

programme.title: Sean Foley
programme.desc: Sean Foley stands accused in the shooting death of his girlfriends step-father. After a booze-filled evening, Sean fatally shoots Jimmy on Jimmys own back porch.

programme.title: Amber Guyger
programme.desc: When an off-duty Dallas police officer shoots a man in his own apartment, the jury will have to decide if it was murder or a tragic mistake. Amber Guyger takes the stand in her own defense.

programme.title: The Landlady
programme.desc: The murder of an elderly landlady offers no forensic answers. Can detectives piece together her final days using security footage to discover the motive of a vicious killer before they strike again?

programme.title: Kerry Lynn Dalton
programme.desc: Kerry Lyn Dalton was sentenced to death for the torture and murder of Irene "Melanie" May. And because Melanie was a meth addict with no fixed address, police did little to investigate her disappearance.

programme.title: Internal Affairs
programme.desc: When a local deputy sheriffs pregnant daughter is shot and killed in her bed, the search for answers gets personal, as investigators suspect a killer close to home.

programme.title: Anthony Sowell: The Cleveland Strangler
programme.desc: African-American women in the Mt Pleasant neighbourhood of Cleveland were vanishing. Their families cried for help, but no one knew what was happening. No one except Anthony Sowell.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Rick
programme.desc: Most high school love ends in heartbreak, but not for Richard and Jolena. Years later, their love is rekindled - but one of them is married to someone else.

programme.title: The Aftermath: Part One
programme.desc: When the participants reunite to discuss the highs and lows of their re-incarceration in the Henry County Jail, explosive arguments erupt within the group. Soledad OBrien hosts.

programme.title: Snake In The Pants
programme.desc: A look at some of the strangest arrests from across the country. A man gets stuck in a chimney while trying to rob a house; pet store owners catch a thief with stolen snakes in his pants; and more.

programme.title: Lion Lady
programme.desc: A bride and her caterer are accused of drugging the wedding guests; a woman climbs into the lions den at The Bronx Zoo; Public outcry as an Alabama grandma is arrested for not paying her trash bill.

programme.title: Beyond the Headlines: The Tanya Kach Story With Elizabeth Smart
programme.desc: In a revealing conversation, Tanya recounts the horror of the 10 years she spent in captivity in her predators bedroom, and confides in Elizabeth about the realities of grooming.

programme.title: Wife Killer Or Medically Insane?
programme.desc: After a woman is stabbed to death by her husband, shockwaves echo around a community. The prosecution claims this is a clear case of murder, but the defence argues that the husband was insane at the time.

programme.title: Sneak Attack
programme.desc: Helena Jayne Bryant notices things missing and stuff misplaced. It takes a sinister encounter with her home invader to make her finally wake up. Next, Brian ONeills Seattle condo turns into a war zone.

programme.desc: Nanny Yoselyn Ortega had been looking after Kevin and Marinas three children. One day, plagued by psychotic thoughts and hearing voices, she snapped, with devastating consequences for two tiny lives.

programme.title: Bachelor Party Foul
programme.desc: Sparks fly at a strip club when TWs tow interrupts a bachelor party. Jeremy and Elmers tow of an "untouchable" car turns into a heated standoff.

programme.title: Ak On The Highway
programme.desc: Officers chase down two suspects with an assault rifle who are intent on shooting their way out. A terrifying pursuit results in multiple casualties.

programme.title: Tased And Confused
programme.desc: Police work can be risky business, especially when criminals are armed. Thats why officers use non-lethal tactics like tasers and bean bag rounds.

programme.title: Dashcam Disasters
programme.desc: Dashcams catch unbelievable vehicle events. Crashes, collisions and cars flying through the air - a dashboard camera can capture it all.

programme.title: Desert Oasis In Sin City
programme.desc: Mike Baldasare and Jim Bellamy build award winning pools for clients all across the southwest, head to Las Vegas to build a dream pool for Shane and Willow Jager.

programme.title: All The Way Around
programme.desc: Mike and Jim have their work cut out for them when a Palm Springs couple wants to transform their narrow three-sided backyard into a personal resort.

programme.title: On The Wire
programme.desc: When a criminal gang takes over a jailhouse, Agent Lewis uncovers a disturbing world of sex, power and corruption. Can she gather enough evidence to take it down?

programme.title: Vegas Hall Pass
programme.desc: Pineapple argues with a woman who has a "hall pass" from her husband. Jeremy gets in a fight, and Elmer hunts for a massive haul.

programme.title: Carolina Gold
programme.desc: Freddy and Juan fly to an urgent SOS from a former Marines dated mine in North Carolina. It will be the guys biggest challenge yet.

programme.title: Spirit Of Christmas
programme.desc: Lucky and friends must figure out how to get home in time for Christmas when a falling boulder -- and a serious snowstorm -- derail their travel plans.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Christmas Bonus
programme.desc: _x000D_ _x000D_When Boss Baby accidentally gets mistaken for an elf and sent to the North Pole on Christmas Eve, he mobilizes unpaid elf workers against an old nemesis: that charity-loving hippie people call Santa Claus. Meanwhile, Tim races to the North Pole to get his baby brother back home in time for Templeton Family Christmas traditions.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Xtreme Xploits of the Xplosive Xmas Special
programme.desc: George and Harold love Christmas, but they feel like it could use some upgrades. So they make a comic about a new version of the holiday: BLISSMAS. Instead of red bows, laser shows! Instead of ugly sweaters, cool capes! Instead of decorating trees, creating tree-bots! The boys take Melvin’s time toad back to convince Santa to incorporate some of their ideas to his new holiday. But they come back to the present to find that their plan didn’t work quite how they’d hoped.

programme.title: Inner Children
programme.desc: JJ reluctantly lets Tina take over her assistant duties for the day, but a Tina slip-up leads to an outbreak of town adults drinking diluted special formula that makes them all baby-brained. When JJ discovers this, she works with R and D Baby Simmons and Security Baby Katja to antidote the wobbling "Adult Babies" before Tina can find out and blame herself.

programme.title: Poompf!
programme.desc: Crispin Biscuits frames Boss and Tina’s startup company for exploding baby Iggy’s favorite stuffed animal, and Tina is forced to the sidelines to avoid any more bad press. As Crispin expands his plan to burst all the plush toys in the neighborhood, Tina discovers she can stop this by breaking open and rewiring a single toy doll. Unfortunately that doll is Baby Corp’s current head honcho, Pull-String CEO Baby.

programme.title: The Last Dumont
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents-her mom.

programme.desc: Alvin and the outcast Vikings terrorize Berk, left defenseless without their dragons, and now only Hiccup can bring them back.

programme.title: How to Pick Your Dragon
programme.desc: Stoick wants to train his own dragon and enlists Hiccup to help him tame the most ferocious species yet.

programme.title: Portrait of Hiccup as a Buff Man
programme.desc: Believing his father is disappointed in him, Hiccup sets out on a dangerous treasure hunt.

programme.title: Lucky and the Double-Dad Dare
programme.desc: Jim and Al set up a survival course for Lucky, Pru and Abigail, but when things go awry, the dads are the ones who need saving

programme.title: Lucky and the Warm Welcome
programme.desc: While Lucky and Spirit continue to explore a life in the circus, best friends Pru and Abigail set out to lasso in their friend back home. programme.title: Moon Shot
programme.desc: Our team’s startup company and their rivals at Baby Corp get in a "Space Race

programme.title: Inner Children
programme.desc: JJ reluctantly lets Tina take over her assistant duties for the day, but a Tina slip-up leads to an outbreak of town adults drinking diluted special formula that makes them all baby-brained. When JJ discovers this, she works with R and D Baby Simmons and Security Baby Katja to antidote the wobbling "Adult Babies" before Tina can find out and blame herself.

programme.title: Poompf!
programme.desc: Crispin Biscuits frames Boss and Tina’s startup company for exploding baby Iggy’s favorite stuffed animal, and Tina is forced to the sidelines to avoid any more bad press. As Crispin expands his plan to burst all the plush toys in the neighborhood, Tina discovers she can stop this by breaking open and rewiring a single toy doll. Unfortunately that doll is Baby Corp’s current head honcho, Pull-String CEO Baby.

programme.title: The Last Dumont
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents-her mom.

programme.title: A Teacup Filled with the Self
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents-her mom.
