The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents-her mom.

programme.title: Like A Fox
programme.desc: Puss gets jealous when Guy Fox shows up and asks Dulcinea to run off with him

programme.title: Triple Cross
programme.desc: Hiccup teams with an unexpected person in search for an antidote when Toothless is seemingly poisoned

programme.title: Inside Jokings / Its A Jungle In There
programme.desc: Tip and Oh make their first inside joke and Oh shares it with everyone; Tip watches Ohs new alien plant while hes gone and breeds a catastrophe.

programme.title: Blackboard Jungle
programme.desc: King Julien organizes an Academic Bowl to prove the lemurs are the smartest on the island

programme.title: Lucky and the Warm Welcome
programme.desc: While Lucky and Spirit continue to explore a life in the circus, best friends Pru and Abigail set out to lasso in their friend back home. With new frontiers, new sights, and new friends the PALs ride free like never-before on wild circus adventures only to realize that theres no place like home.

programme.title: Best Frenemies/The Jamaican Jerk Chickens
programme.desc: Skidmark gets jealous when White Shadow and Turbo become best friends; the crew must race as a bobsled team against the favored Jamaican Chickens.

programme.title: Razors Edge
programme.desc: Keith and Krolia cross a new space universe in search of a powerful source of Quintessence

programme.title: Peabodys Diet/Ponce De Leon
programme.desc: During a food-themed show, Peabody realizes he is out of shape but still just cant stop eating so it’s up to Sherman to help him lose weight

programme.title: Pirate Primrose
programme.desc: The tots are playing at pirates, all except Primrose, who is being a princess, naturally. But guess which tot has the best pirating skills when they are needed

programme.title: Primrose Loses It
programme.desc: Primrose has broken her new necklace and lost the beads. She is unconsolable. Violet holds a make and do party to replace the necklace

programme.title: The Case Of The Moving Train Tracks
programme.desc: Queen Sparklewings is having a fairy picnic in Fable Forest that evening. Everyone offers to help set up for the picnic but Queen Sparklewings tells them not to worry - the fairies can do it all. Later, when Noddy and all his friends are approaching Fable Forest Station on the train they discover someone has redirected the train tracks. They cant get to Fable Forest. How will they have the picnic in time? Noddy needs to investigate why the train tracks have been moved.

programme.title: The Case Of The King Of Toyland
programme.desc: Noddy returns from a Make and Take party at Pat-Pats and finds the Builders are constructing a big orange palace in Toy Green. by order of the King of Toyland! Noddy decides to investigate: who is the mysterious King of Toyland? He spots the Knights carrying a royal litter, but all he can see inside is the top of an orange crown. Realising the Kings favourite colour must be orange, Noddy remembers seeing Pat-Pat painting a bowl of oranges and wonders if she knows who the King is.

programme.title: Why Parrot Cant Keep A Secret
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Parrot was the best keeper of secrets in the whole of Tinga Tinga. Infact Parrot couldnt open his beak at all! Then one day some beast dares to steal Lions mane and Parrot sees the whole thing! But how is going to tell Lion?! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Why Bushbaby Has Big Eyes
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Bushbaby didnt have big eyes. She had tiny little eyes and she was always getting lost. Strange things begin to happen and there are stories that Majitu the Great Giant has returned to Tinga Tinga. Young Bushbaby doesnt believe a word of it... and convinces the other animals that Majitu the Giant does not exist. "If you cant see him, hes not real". But then she does see the Giant and her eyes grow big as planets. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roarys Demolition Derby
programme.desc: Roary is in a mischievous mood and keeps crashing into things. Big Chris has a great idea how Roary can burn up all his energy and be helpful at the same time!

programme.title: Manners Please
programme.desc: Farmer Green and FB are very nervous about going to Mama Mias garden party. James and the other cars offer to teach them how to behave at such an event. But everything doesnt quite go to plan…

programme.title: Home Alone
programme.desc: Aggro, Burple and Cutter are left alone in the roost to care for some dragon eggs, but a trio of tricky Slinkwings want those eggs for themselves.

programme.title: Happy Pawtomotiversary / Winner, Winner, Lasagna Dinner
programme.desc: Pawston is celebrating the 40th anniversary of Grandmaw and Grandpaws Pawtomotive Garage! As a surprise, Tag and Paw decide to track down items to recreate the garage to look like it did when it first opened while the rest of the family distract the Grandpawrents. / Tag and Wind face off in the Lasagna Games for a chance to be Sam’s new Crew Chief. A series of lasagna-themed games will challenge their speed, fix-it skills, and leadership. But there can only be one winner.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Xtreme Xploits of the Xplosive Xmas Special
programme.desc: George and Harold love Christmas, but they feel like it could use some upgrades. So they make a comic about a new version of the holiday: BLISSMAS. Instead of red bows, laser shows! Instead of ugly sweaters, cool capes! Instead of decorating trees, creating tree-bots! The boys take Melvin’s time toad back to convince Santa to incorporate some of their ideas to his new holiday. But they come back to the present to find that their plan didn’t work quite how they’d hoped.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Christmas Bonus
programme.desc: _x000D_ _x000D_When Boss Baby accidentally gets mistaken for an elf and sent to the North Pole on Christmas Eve, he mobilizes unpaid elf workers against an old nemesis: that charity-loving hippie people call Santa Claus. Meanwhile, Tim races to the North Pole to get his baby brother back home in time for Templeton Family Christmas traditions.

programme.title: Spirit Of Christmas
programme.desc: Lucky and friends must figure out how to get home in time for Christmas when a falling boulder -- and a serious snowstorm -- derail their travel plans.

programme.desc: Oh takes it upon himself to introduce Christmas joy to his fellow Boovs. Unfortunately, his well-meaning mission nearly destroys the city.

programme.title: One Tricked Pony
programme.desc: An overworked and under loved Precious has to choose between the Templeton Family startup business or Crispin Biscuits’ fun playtime. Meanwhile, the company makes its first purchase: upgraded communicators! R and D Baby Simmons is reluctant to fix the model they have, which picks up signals from her favorite lvorian soap opera, "Bridges Aflame." Over a live broadcast, Simmons must convince the cast to tie up every loose plot thread before she has to lose the signal forever.

programme.title: Federal Slumber Party
programme.desc: Uncle Benji makes a surprise visit to the Templeton Family with a cute baby of his own: Lil Bit Guerrero! Tina gets jealous of Carol doting on Lil Bit, while Benji reveals that in order to make his daughter proud of him, he’s applied to become a Federal Agent. With Boss Baby’s cover at stake, it’s up to the Templeton Family to get Benji out of their hair as he sniffs around for a case that could garner the attention from federal law enforcement.

Tina has to cover up how the heat has split her coworkers into lawless factions fighting over a fan and a mist cooler.

programme.title: Family Matters
programme.desc: The riders realize the Flyers are using the Deathsong to capture Singetails and plan a rescue mission to liberate them

programme.title: Dang You Saved My Life / Boovsland Noir
programme.desc: Sharzod hates feeling indebted to Tip after being rescued and tries to get "even"; Police King Kyle must solve the case of Sharzods missing mojo.

programme.title: Lord Of The Fruit Flies
programme.desc: King Julien tries to rig an election so that Maurice becomes Mango Prime Minister but soon realizes his opponent Mort has a better shot than everyone thinks

programme.title: Lucky and the Dressage Sabotage
programme.desc: While Lucky and Spirit continue to explore a life in the circus, best friends Pru and Abigail set out to lasso in their friend back home. programme.title: The Ants And The Grasshoppers/Dont Feed The Troll
programme.desc: The crew teams up with grasshoppers in a fight against devious picnic ants; Turbo goes to great lengths to make somebody on the internet like him.

programme.title: Monsters and Mana
programme.desc: Allura and Lance walk in on Shiro, Pidge, Hunk, and Coran playing a magical role-playing board game

programme.title: Secret Agent Sherman/Alexander Cartwright
programme.desc: When a special guest is revealed as the villainous Goldentoe and hijacks the show, Peabody and Sherman must find a way to escape and regain control

programme.title: Dr Webby
programme.desc: Bumbles sneezing has got so bad, it is keeping everyone awake at night. Webby gives Fifi a recipe for a cure for sneezes… will it work?

programme.title: Make Room For Fifi
programme.desc: There is a horrid smell in Fifis garden. Fifi goes to stay with Primrose and Violet while they try and work out where the smell is coming from. What could be causing it?

programme.title: The Case Of The Flyaway Balloons
programme.desc: Everyone is decorating special balloons in Toyland. Theyre going to have a big Balloon Release at the end of the day and see how far they can fly. But when Noddy returns in the afternoon with Big Ears, the balloons have already flown away! Noddy decides to investigate. Following all the clues, he arrives at Deltoids house. The action hero toy tells him that he only took back his specially decorated balloon. The others were still there earlier.

programme.title: The Case Of The Missing Brick
programme.desc: Noddy and his friends are building a toy tower. Carlton is joining in and having a great time. Theyve almost finished when one of the brick pieces goes missing! Oh no. How can they finish the tower without the last brick? Noddy needs to investigate. Using his detecting skills Noddy soon finds the missing brick.

programme.title: Why Guinea Fowl Has Dots
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Guinea Fowl didnt have dots. She was an adventurous bird and loved to discover things. One day Tortoise challenges her to find out why the top of Mount Tinga Tinga shines. Guinea Fowl cant resist and races off, over the desert, past the ocean, up to the very top of Mount Tinga Tinga where she does indeed discover why the top of Mount Tinga Tinga shines.... SNOW! Guinea Fowl is the first ever animal to see snow! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Why Buffalo Has Horns
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Buffalo didnt have horns. He had very long shaggy hair and he lived near the Swamp. But then one day the Swamp moves and Buffalo has to find a new home! The Swamp grows and grows and soon all the horned animals who live on the Plains risk losing their home too. So Buffalo decides to save the day and push back the muddy swamp. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Big Chris Big Jump
programme.desc: Big Chris has agreed to do a parachute jump for charity but loses his nerve on the big day. Can Roary talk him through it, just like Big Chris did for him when he got scared?

programme.title: Brassless Bandfinal
programme.desc: The brass band booked for the Silver Hatch parade have cancelled. Mr Carburettor will be furious if he doesnt have music at his parade. Roary and his friends think up an ingenious plan...

programme.title: Furious Fun
programme.desc: The Rescue Riders have a "Dragon Day" to show their skills to a young fan, but Aggro skips it to hang out with her new fun -- but reckless -- friends.

programme.title: Bites, Camera, Action! / Stay, Dog. Stay!
programme.desc: When Tag finds out that Pawston has a chance to host the Dogcathalon Race, she and Scooch rush around to create a movie to show why their city should host. Unfortunately everything seems to go wrong. Will Tag and Scooch be able to save their movie before time runs out? / When Tags construction project accidentally damages Frank and Beans’ house, she invites them to stay with her family during repairs. Tag does her best to keep Frank and Beans busy so they don’t get in the Barkers’ way.

programme.title: Tip And Oh: Home For The Holidays
programme.desc: Oh takes it upon himself to introduce Christmas joy to his fellow Boovs. Unfortunately, his well-meaning mission nearly destroys the city.

programme.title: Puss In Boots: The Three Diablos
programme.desc: After Puss in Boots is captured by soldiers he is enlisted to re-steal the priceless "Heart of Fire Ruby" a ruby stolen by the notorious, wicked and impossible-to-hear villain, known as The Whisperer. Puss must partner with the villains henchmen, The Three Little Kittens, to seize the ruby. Babysitting has never been more dangerous. Will our hero Puss in Boots tame the Three Diablos in time to recover the ruby?

programme.title: Far Far Away Idol
programme.desc: Watch your favorite Shrek characters sing the night away in this hilarious spoof. Join in the fun as Fiona, Puss in Boots, Donkey and the rest of the Far Far Away Kingdom battle it out in a singers showdown.

programme.title: Scared Shrekless
programme.desc: Shrek gets in the Halloween spirit by challenging his fairytale friends to come up with scary stories for a contest. But the gang learn that theyll have to spend the night in Lord Farquaads haunted castle before the winner is named.

programme.title: Madly Madagascar
programme.desc: Romance is in the air for Alex, Marty, Gloria and Melman after King Julien discovers a magical perfume and takes on the role as "King of Love."

programme.title: The Pig Who Cried Werewolf
programme.desc: The Three Pigs live in a house together, but Heimlich gets scared when he sees Wolf move in next door and acting strange.

programme.title: The Ghost Of Lord Farquaad
programme.desc: Shrek, Fiona, and Donkey are on their way to the hotel where Shrek and Fiona will spend their honeymoon when they encounter Lord Farquaads ghost!

programme.title: Megamind: The Button Of Doom
programme.desc: After one "button" unleashes the gigantic robot MEGA-MEGAmind on Metro City, MegaMind and Minion must rely on their old tricks to restore order.

programme.title: Monsters Vs Aliens: Mutant Pumpkins From Outer Space
programme.desc: Susan Murphy (a.k.a. Ginormica) and the Monsters are now working with the US government as special ops. So when an alien presence is detected in Susans hometown of Modesto, California -- right before Halloween -- the team is dispatched to investigate. Everything appears normal, right down to the jack-o-lanterns peering out from every doorstep and windowsill. But when Halloween arrives, those innocent-looking carved pumpkins reveal themselves for what they really are mutant aliens.

So when an alien presence is detected in Susans hometown of Modesto, California -- right before Halloween -- the team is dispatched to investigate. Everything appears normal, right down to the jack-o-lanterns peering out from every doorstep and windowsill. But when Halloween arrives, those innocent-looking carved pumpkins reveal themselves for what they really are mutant aliens.

programme.title: Puss In Boots: The Three Diablos
programme.desc: After Puss in Boots is captured by soldiers he is enlisted to re-steal the priceless "Heart of Fire Ruby" a ruby stolen by the notorious, wicked and impossible-to-hear villain, known as The Whisperer. Puss must partner with the villains henchmen, The Three Little Kittens, to seize the ruby. Babysitting has never been more dangerous. Will our hero Puss in Boots tame the Three Diablos in time to recover the ruby?

programme.title: Far Far Away Idol
programme.desc: Watch your favorite Shrek characters sing the night away in this hilarious spoof. Join in the fun as Fiona, Puss in Boots, Donkey and the rest of the Far Far Away Kingdom battle it out in a singers showdown.

programme.title: Scared Shrekless
programme.desc: Shrek gets in the Halloween spirit by challenging his fairytale friends to come up with scary stories for a contest. But the gang learn that theyll have to spend the night in Lord Farquaads haunted castle before the winner is named.

programme.title: Madly Madagascar
programme.desc: Romance is in the air for Alex, Marty, Gloria and Melman after King Julien discovers a magical perfume and takes on the role as "King of Love."

programme.title: The Pig Who Cried Werewolf
programme.desc: The Three Pigs live in a house together, but Heimlich gets scared when he sees Wolf move in next door and acting strange.

programme.title: The Ghost Of Lord Farquaad
programme.desc: Shrek, Fiona, and Donkey are on their way to the hotel where Shrek and Fiona will spend their honeymoon when they encounter Lord Farquaads ghost!

programme.title: Megamind: The Button Of Doom
programme.desc: After one "button" unleashes the gigantic robot MEGA-MEGAmind on Metro City, MegaMind and Minion must rely on their old tricks to restore order.

programme.title: Monsters Vs Aliens: Mutant Pumpkins From Outer Space
programme.desc: Susan Murphy (a.k.a. Ginormica) and the Monsters are now working with the US government as special ops. So when an alien presence is detected in Susans hometown of Modesto, California -- right before Halloween -- the team is dispatched to investigate. Everything appears normal, right down to the jack-o-lanterns peering out from every doorstep and windowsill. But when Halloween arrives, those innocent-looking carved pumpkins reveal themselves for what they really are mutant aliens.

programme.title: Breaking The Bank
programme.desc: Crispin Biscuits heists the underwater Baby Bank in an attempt to steal all the funds from Boss and Tina’s new company. Boss, Tina and Banker Baby Benny must infiltrate the bank via submarine to stop this high-stakes aquatic robbery. But Boss and Tina struggle to stay on the same page after Tina admits that she might, kinda, sorta be thinking about retiring as a regular baby.

programme.title: Hate That Baby!
programme.desc: After Crispin Biscuits changes the Baby Love economy to reward companies for bringing in baby hate, Boss Baby is forced to make himself the most hated baby in town to save their startup company. Meanwhile, Tina needs to end Crispin Biscuits’ attacks on their company before she can finally hang up her boss role and retire to a life of cuddle time with daddy and mommy.

programme.title: The Battle of Tianshang Part 2
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents-her mom.

programme.title: The Pangea-ing
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents-her mom.

programme.title: The Poison Ravine
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents-her mom.

programme.title: Viking For Hire
programme.desc: Now that dragon-killing is no longer necessary, Hiccup tries to find a new job for Gobber the Blacksmith, but the task proves harder than expected.

programme.title: Animal House
programme.desc: As an approaching storm threatens Berk, Hiccup must work fast to make peace between the food-providing farm animals and the dragons.

programme.title: The Terrible Twos
programme.desc: When Hiccup adopts a baby dragon that appears orphaned, Toothless becomes jealous and the baby dragon’s bereaved mother threatens the village.

programme.title: Lucky and the New Frontier (Part 2)
programme.desc: While Lucky and Spirit continue to explore a life in the circus, best friends Pru and Abigail set out to lasso in their friend back home. With new frontiers, new sights, and new friends the PALs ride free like never-before on wild circus adventures only to realize that theres no place like home.

programme.title: The Frontier Fillies Summer Outdoor Jubilee
programme.desc: Luckys competitive side comes out at the Frontier Fillies Summer Outdoor Jubilee when the PALs meet the BUDs -- a group of talented young rivals.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Shane Mosley vs. Luis Collazo
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features welterweights Sugar Shane Mosley (43-4, 37 KOs) and Luis Collazo (27-2, 13 KOs) fighting over the interim WBC title. This fight took place at the Mandalay Bay Resort and Casino in Las Vegas, Nevada, USA, on February 10, 2007.

programme.title: Zagreb Grand Prix
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best Judo from the Zagreb Grand Prix, where some of the young Judo fans get the opportunity to train with former Olympic champion Mark Huizinga and triple world champion Illias Iliadis. Plus we watch as Judos biggest star Teddy Riner competes in the +100 kg division.

programme.title: Budapest 2023 - Episode 3
programme.desc: The highest level of competition in the sport of karate anywhere in the world will take place from Budapest, Hungary, as the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS take place. The top competitors from across the globe, from six different continents, will all converge on Budapest to stake their claim as the best in the world. Dont miss the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS, only on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Chris Arreola vs. Tomasz Adamek
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a heavyweight collision between Chris Arreola and Tomasz Adamek in a battle of one-loss competitors. Also on the card, Rocky Jearez takes on Jorge Barrios before a gruesome cut calls an end to the fight.

programme.title: Kyushu, Japan: Show 3
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 3 featuring Daieisho, Shohozan, Aoiyama and Chiyonokuni from the Kyushu basho, 2018.

programme.title: Las Vegas Finale: Part 2
programme.desc: In the season finale of American Ninja Warrior, the top contestants from across the nation compete in the ultimate athletic challenge. With the bright lights of Las Vegas shining on the finalists and the crowd cheering on the competition, the ANW finale celebrates the passion of all the aspiring Ninja Warriors that pursued the privilege to grapple with the famously intimidating Mount Midoriyama.

programme.title: FS MMA Fernando Rodrigues Jr. vs. Karol Bedorf
programme.desc: In this edition of FIGHT SPORTS MMA, we highlight the Main Event of KSW 37, featuring Fernando Rodrigues Jr. of Brazil taking on local favorite Karol Bedorf of Poland. Rodrigues brings in a stellar record of 10-2 into the cage, while his opponent Beforf comes in an equally impressive 14-2. Its a huge Main Event from Poland, on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS WCK Luis Tavares vs Fatih Ulusoy

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Andre Berto vs. David Estrada
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a bout to determine a new NABF welterweight champion, as Andre Berto faces David Estrada. Also on the card, kickboxing legends Errol Zimmerman and Daniel Ghita battle to a gruesome end.

programme.title: Ring Girl Brittany Palmer, Dolce Diet, Melvin Guillard and more!
programme.desc: This episode features a look at how John Alessio, a MMA veteran of almost 20 years, prepares for an upcoming fight. programme.title: MEGA Fights Sergio Martinez vs. Paul Williams I
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features middleweights Sergio Maravilla Martinez (44-1, 24 KOs) vs. Paul The Punisher Williams (37-1, 27 KOs) from Boardwalk Hall in Atlantic City, New Jersey, USA, on December 5, 2009. The result was a controversial majority decision, and the two would eventually square off in a rematch about a year later.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Lamont Peterson vs. Amir Khan
programme.desc: Lamont Peterson takes on Amir Khan in a bout with a controversial ending, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: Tashkent Grand Prix
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best Judo from the Tashkent Grand Prix, we speak with one of Israels fighters Sagi Muki about the importance of positivity in the face of adversity, and we stop to get to know Dzmitry Minkou, a young talent in the world of Judo.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Amir Khan vs. Marcos Maidana
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Amir Khan defending the WBA light welterweight title against Marcos Maidana in a bout that earned 2010 Fight of the Year honors from the Boxing Writers Association of America. Also on the card, a young Adrien Broner showcases his skills.

programme.title: Kyushu, Japan: Show 5

Show 5 featuring Aoiyama, Endo, Takakeisho and Tamawashi from the Kyushu basho, 2018.

programme.title: In Kerala, India
programme.desc: Episode 12: Kerala, India - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Kalarippayattu and the Martial Art of Sword, Shield, Sticks, Open Hand and Kicks with Master Sureshan Nambiar.

programme.title: FS MMA Ante Delija vs. Oli Thompson
programme.desc: In this episode of FIGHT SPORTS MMA, we take you to action from KSW in Zagreb, Croatia, when local heavyweight Ante Delija from Dubrovnik takes on Oli "The Spartan" Thompson of East Sussex, England. The massive Delija, standing 65" and nearly 240 lbs (108 kg) holds a spectacular 16-3 record with tremendous power. Thompson is a veteran with 20 wins in his MMA career, and can stand toe-to-toe with Delija in his home country.

programme.title: Tashkent Grand Prix
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best Judo from the Tashkent Grand Prix, we speak with one of Israels fighters Sagi Muki about the importance of positivity in the face of adversity, and we stop to get to know Dzmitry Minkou, a young talent in the world of Judo.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Amir Khan vs. Marcos Maidana
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Amir Khan defending the WBA light welterweight title against Marcos Maidana in a bout that earned 2010 Fight of the Year honors from the Boxing Writers Association of America. Also on the card, a young Adrien Broner showcases his skills.

programme.title: Kyushu, Japan: Show 5
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 5 featuring Aoiyama, Endo, Takakeisho and Tamawashi from the Kyushu basho, 2018.

programme.title: In Kerala, India
programme.desc: Episode 12: Kerala, India - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Kalarippayattu and the Martial Art of Sword, Shield, Sticks, Open Hand and Kicks with Master Sureshan Nambiar.

programme.title: FS MMA Ante Delija vs. Oli Thompson
programme.desc: In this episode of FIGHT SPORTS MMA, we take you to action from KSW in Zagreb, Croatia, when local heavyweight Ante Delija from Dubrovnik takes on Oli "The Spartan" Thompson of East Sussex, England. The massive Delija, standing 65" and nearly 240 lbs (108 kg) holds a spectacular 16-3 record with tremendous power. Thompson is a veteran with 20 wins in his MMA career, and can stand toe-to-toe with Delija in his home country.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Sergio Martinez vs. Paul Williams I
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features middleweights Sergio Maravilla Martinez (44-1, 24 KOs) vs. Paul The Punisher Williams (37-1, 27 KOs) from Boardwalk Hall in Atlantic City, New Jersey, USA, on December 5, 2009. The result was a controversial majority decision, and the two would eventually square off in a rematch about a year later.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Lamont Peterson vs. Amir Khan
programme.desc: Lamont Peterson takes on Amir Khan in a bout with a controversial ending, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: WCCB Carlos Ocampo vs. Mikael Zewski
programme.desc: From the Colisee in Quebec, Canada, Mikael Zewski competes in front of his hometown fans against world-ranked veteran Carlos Ocampo of Mexico, with the WBC Continental Americas Super Welterweight Title on the line. Ocampo is a tough competitor, taking on the best in the world including Errol Spence Jr. for the IBF Welterweight World Championship. Zewski is also no stranger to the big stage, having held several North American and International WBA, IBF, and WBO titles himself.

programme.title: Budapest World Championship
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this special one hour episode, we see the best of the World Judo Championships from Budapest where everyone in the world swarms to witness the crowning of 14 world champions. Also, world renowned fighter Teddy Riner experiences his hardest title defense in his career.

programme.title: Occupy Bears
programme.desc: When the city plans to destroy the Bears cave in order to make way for a new cell phone tower, Grizz and Panda must find evidence from their past that proves they have rights to their land.

programme.title: Bright Lights, Black Hearts
programme.desc: Ben, Gwen and Max stop by the graveyard set of Gwens favourite TV show, The Unalivers. Before long, Ben discovers its lead, Michael Morningstar, is an energy vampire.

programme.title: Adventures In Babysitting
programme.desc: Ben, Gwen and Max meet a family that appears to be a mirror image of them, but when Max goes off on a hike with their matriarch, Maxine, Ben is forced to babysit the bratty Simon Sez.

programme.title: Steam Is The Word
programme.desc: In the heart of Silicon Valley, Ben has to stop Victorian villain, Steam Smythe, from securing an epic power source sealed in a Tesla time capsule.

programme.title: Recipe For Disaster
programme.desc: During Chefapalooza in the Rocky Mountains, three famous chefs and infamous bad-guys, The Tri-Chefta, hunt down Wildvine in hopes of creating their most exotic dish to date.

programme.title: All Wet
programme.desc: No one believes Ben when he insists that one of the other patrons, waiting in line at the World of Wet Water Park, is the nefarious Frightwig, disguised as a common girl.

programme.title: The Prince And The Dark Lord Of Moletown
programme.desc: Prince Ivandoe is unsurprised to discover that he is worshipped by a group of moles.

programme.title: The Prince And The Squire-Off
programme.desc: Bert enters a prestigious Squire-Off tournament, in order to prove himself worthy of being Prince Ivandoes squire.

programme.title: The Prince And The Kissy Curse
programme.desc: An arrogant little frogman needs the help of Prince Ivandoe to lift his curse and become the big, beautiful bullfrog he once was.

programme.title: The Prince And The Nutty Wedding
programme.desc: Prince Ivandoe triumphantly finds the One True Acorn, during a rigged royal contest.

programme.title: The Prince And The Golden Father
programme.desc: When Prince Ivandoe saves the life of a Wishapillar, he is granted a wish.

programme.title: Bert And Ernies Opposite Day
programme.desc: Its Opposite Day on Sesame Street and everyones doing things that are as different as they can be. Bert and Ernie notice that everyones having fun doing opposites and realize they like so many opposite things too!

programme.title: Elmo And Abbys Ocean Adventure
programme.desc: Abby turns Sesame Street into a magical ocean so Dorothy can swim anywhere she likes but when she disappears, Elmo and Abby follow clues to find her.

programme.title: LEGO DC Comics Super Heroes: Justice League: Attack Of The Legion Of Doom!
programme.desc: Get ready for the bricks to fly when Superman, Batman and the rest of the Justice League face off against the worlds greatest super villains!

programme.title: LEGO DC Comics Super Heroes: Justice League: Cosmic Clash
programme.desc: With the fate of Earth and the Justice League at stake, Batman must outsmart the evil intergalactic machine that has the power to bend time.

programme.title: Episode 5
programme.desc: An outrageously insane new game show of puzzles and brainteasers for kids to play on television.

programme.title: Episode 6
programme.desc: An outrageously insane new game show of puzzles and brainteasers for kids to play on television.

programme.title: Yard Sale
programme.desc: Each Bear gets offbeat items at a local yard sale. Their new possessions send them on their own separate adventures.

programme.title: Slumber Party
programme.desc: A thunderstorm forces Chloe to spend the night at the Cave with the Bears. When Chloes parents tell the Bears to protect Chloe, they take the task a bit too seriously.

programme.title: Bear Cleanse
programme.desc: A doctor tells the Bears to go on a cleanse to improve their health. But when Grizz realises he can only eat what grizzly bears eat, he starts to lose his mind.

programme.title: Nom Noms Entourage
programme.desc: Nom Nom recruits the Bears to act as his entourage of friends. But when the Bears realise Nom Nom doesnt understand friendship, they decide to kick their day of bonding into high gear.

programme.title: Charlie Ball
programme.desc: After Panda gets injured on the basketball court, the Bears invite Charlie to be on their basketball team. But when Charlie gets too good, he starts to ruin all the fun of the game.

programme.title: Story, Bored
programme.desc: During a book signing at a medieval castle, Ben must stop Hex from getting his hands on a grimoire that can fuse its user with mythical beasts, creating monstrous hybrids!

programme.title: Xingo
programme.desc: Ben is interested in a marathon of his favourite cartoon show, Spazz, but when Ben goes Upgrade to get a better signal, the titular Spazz leaps from his animated dimension, bringing chaos with him!

programme.title: Drive You Crazy
programme.desc: After the Rust Bucket breaks down at a Mobile Home Park, Ben discovers theyve stumbled on to the last leg of the Cali 10 Hundred, an epic, off-road auto race.

programme.title: Scared Silly
programme.desc: When the Rust Bucket runs out of gas on a foggy, East Coast road, Ben, Gwen and Max are forced to stay at a hotel being menaced by Creepy Carl - a local folklore expert, who may actually be a ghost!

programme.title: Hole In 10
programme.desc: While mini-golfing, Ben is attacked by the Ground Hawgs, a gang of Dr. Animo mutants turned bikers. Ben must turn alien to stop them before they set their sights on the city down the road.

programme.title: The Prince And The Birthday Bluesies
programme.desc: When Prince Ivandoe gets a case of the "Birthday Bluesies

programme.title: The Prince And The Chosen One
programme.desc: When Bert unknowingly pulls a sword from a stone, he is suddenly appointed the leader of the Heroic Council of Heroes.

programme.title: The Prince And The Tickly Torment
programme.desc: Prince Ivandoe stumbles across a secret meeting of the Royal Society for the Punishment of Peasants.

programme.title: The Prince And The Ducky Day
programme.desc: For Prince Ivandoe every day feels exactly the same...because it is!!! And hes the only one who can see it.

programme.title: The Prince And The All-Alone Gnome
programme.desc: Hansi, a Sassy Gnome, has been left all alone by his brothers.

programme.title: The Feelings Fair
programme.desc: Sesame Street is having a Feelings Fair where all the games, crafts and food are about feelings! Elmo, Alan, and Julia learn to figure out how someones feeling by looking at their friends facial expressions and what they do with their bodies.

programme.title: The Sign Language Abcs

programme.title: Here Comes The Calvin-ry!

programme.title: Zip Tie Lies

programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.desc: The story centers Liu Mian Tang (Wang Chu Ran), who is severely injured and rescued by Cui Xing Zhou (Zhang Wan Yi). Mian Tang mistakes Xing Zhou for her husband after waking up with amnesia. She follows him to guard the frontier, and eventually fall in love.

programme.title: Strange Tales of Tang Dynasty II - To The West

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Find out all about the top goods and services as shown on television, with consumers being able to place orders for these products.

programme.title: Movie - Kumbakonam Gopalu
programme.desc: Gopal, a shrewd man hailing from a small town, earns a living by cheating people. When he stumbles across the diary of a deceased woman, he decides to blackmail the three men linked to her.

programme.title: Movie - Ramachandra
programme.desc: Due to his honesty and refusal to meet the demands of those in power, Inspector Ramachandran is often transferred from one town to another. Soon, he finds himself in an area that is highly terrorised.

programme.title: Movie - En Thangachi Padichava
programme.desc: When a police officer gets transferred to a troubled village terrorised by a wealthy landlord, he seeks the help of an ex-convict to seize the tyrant.

programme.title: Movie - Vettiyai Madichu Kattu
programme.desc: Jai, a timid father, pretends to be brave in order to instill courage into his son. However, he gets into trouble when he is forced to be a witness against a goon by his son.

programme.title: Movie - Devarattam
programme.desc: Vetri, a young lawyer with anger issues, murders his friend in broad daylight who also happens to be the son of a local gangster. Later, the gangster wishes to kill Vetri.

programme.title: Movie - Maraivaasi
programme.desc: A billionaires son returns after his fathers death and joins the company as a regular employee in order to nab the people responsible for his fathers murder.

programme.title: Movie - Vaikarai Pookkal
programme.desc: Vellaisamy Gounder is a village chief who is in favour of casteism. He forbids the romantic relationship between Deivanai and the village doctor when the latter refuses to reveal his caste.

programme.title: Movie - Vanjagan
programme.desc: A man dumps a bag while being chased by goons. A reporter finds it and learns about a murder plan of four important people. Two are already dead and she too gets kidnapped trying to save the others.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Find out all about the top goods and services as shown on television, with consumers being able to place orders for these products.

programme.title: Movie - Puthiya Mugham
programme.desc: When Shiva saves a group of children from terrorists, he is recruited into the Indian army. Later, he falls in love with Anjali, who is unaware of his real identity.

programme.title: Movie - Avatharam
programme.desc: Kuppusamy is crazy about acting in theatre. He joins a troupe and falls in love with Ponnama, a blind lady. However, the troupe struggles financially and is disbanded.

programme.title: Movie - En Bommukkutti Ammavukku
programme.desc: Vinod and Lakshmi, who lost their daughter in an accident, adopt Tinu, a vivacious young girl, from an orphanage. However, the family faces challenges when Tinus birth parents set out to find her.

programme.title: Movie - Raja Kaiya Vecha
programme.desc: Raja pretends to be a cop in order to impress the woman he loves, and she dumps him on learning the truth. When they meet again, he has a good job, but there is someone else who is in love with him.

programme.title: Movie - Sandamarutham
programme.desc: Suriya, an undercover cop, must fight against the evil Sarveswaran, who plans to destroy the entire country with a chemical bomb, before it is too late.

programme.title: Movie - Allauddin
programme.desc: A slum boy who steals from the rich to help the poor keeps scheming against a powerful man. After he finds a magical lamp, which the man had been seeking, he thwarts the mans attempts to abduct him.

programme.title: Movie - Vavval Pasanga
programme.desc: A youngster is compelled to choose an unfavourable path because of societal pressure.

programme.title: Movie - Vegam
programme.desc: Sidharth and Daveed decide to get rich at any cost, hoping to lead a luxurious life, but they get into some unperceived danger and struggle to set things right.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Find out all about the top goods and services as shown on television, with consumers being able to place orders for these products.

programme.title: Movie - Banda Paramasivam
programme.desc: Cheran and Pandiyan are stepbrothers who hate each other, and their respective daughters continue their enmity. Their lives take a turn when two petty thieves enter their houses posing as rich grooms.

programme.title: Movie - Kudumbam
programme.desc: Vijay becomes an alcoholic after his wife Devi dies while delivering a baby. After he abandons his newborn child, his sister Vijaya starts taking care of his daughter.

programme.title: Movie - Manmatha Leelai
programme.desc: Manmatha Leelai is a 1976 Indian Tamil-language romantic comedy film written and directed by K. Balachander.

programme.title: Movie - Aasayil Oru Kaditham
programme.desc: Unaware that Lakshmi is his friend Anands fiancee, Karthik ends up sending her a love letter. Things turn ugly when Anand suspects Lakshmi of infidelity after getting married to her.

programme.title: Movie - Aval Varuvala
programme.desc: Divya keeps rejecting Jeevas love due to her dreadful past with her psycho husband, which she later reveals to him. When Divya finally decides to marry Jeeva, her husband reappears in her life.

programme.title: Ninja Truth
programme.desc: The Shinobi Rokugu was a set of 6 spy tools that were indispensable to the ninja. Well examine each tool using action-packed reenactments, and scientifically analyze how to master the Kaginawa.

programme.title: Magical Japanese "Snow"
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture. This episode looks at words related to snow. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: The perfect shading in beautiful tie-dyed patterns may result from sections randomly touching in the dye. Discover the future of clamp resist dyeing.

programme.desc: Project X returns for the first time in 18 years. The former series featured people involved in project related to the Japanese industry and contemporary history. The new series focuses on people in the "Lost Era" following the collapse of the bubble economy. In every era, there are always those take on challenges. Even without receiving praise or being in the spotlight, some dedicate themselves to their work. The documentary delivers passion and courage right to you.

programme.title: Barbazoo Cant Say No / The Doppelganger
programme.desc: Barbazoo is ready to help. But Barbabright and Barbabelle abuse his kindness and drive him crazy. // By chance, Barbazoo realizes he can imitate Barbapapa. He uses this opportunity to distribute chores to his brothers and sisters. Will they find out?

programme.title: The Amazing Stunt Kitty
programme.desc: When a big stunt goes awry, Darington is sent flying away on an out-of-control balloon! Now, its up to Blaze, AJ, and Daringtons sidekick Stunt Kitty to save the day!

programme.title: Dino Derby
programme.desc: Today, dinosaur Blaze is teaming up with his prehistoric pal Zeg to compete in... the Dino Derby! But will this dino duo have what it takes to outrace the rest and become Dino Derby champions?

programme.desc: Maxs new best friend, Sharkdog, comes home with him, but keeping him a secret from his parents is a challenge.

programme.title: Unfetch
programme.desc: When Sharkdog fetches items that belong to the residents of Foggy Springs, Max needs to help him return them all before anyone notices.

programme.title: Mr Bull in a China Shop
programme.desc: While enjoying a tea break, Mr Bull accidentally breaks his delicate teapot. He takes the pieces to Miss Rabbit in the hope that she can mend it.

programme.title: Fruit
programme.desc: It is fruit day at the supermarket, and Miss Rabbit is making fruit smoothies. Everyone is picking their favourite fruits to blend. George gets a special dinosaur juice, to make him big and strong. Roar!

programme.title: Georges Balloon
programme.desc: George is finding it difficult to keep hold of his big balloon. Can anyone stop it from flying off to the moon?

programme.title: Pirate Treasure
programme.desc: Pirate Peppa and friends put together a chest of treasure and bury it in a marked spot. Soon Pedro needs to follow the trail as he realises he has lost something.

programme.title: Pancakes / SMores
programme.desc: Tiny Chef makes pancakes but loses his confidence when he breaks his special lucky pancake flipping spatula. // Tiny Chef makes SMores for a campout and overcomes his fear of the dark with help from his friends.

programme.title: Barba TV / The Museum
programme.desc: The barbababies are glued to the TV. Since they love it so much, their parents encourage them to make their own shows. // The Barbapapa visit the museum of evolution. On the program: creation of the Earth, Precambrian submarine and... dinosaurs!

programme.title: Barbazoo Cant Say No / The Doppelganger
programme.desc: Barbazoo is ready to help. But Barbabright and Barbabelle abuse his kindness and drive him crazy. // By chance, Barbazoo realizes he can imitate Barbapapa. He uses this opportunity to distribute chores to his brothers and sisters. Will they find out?

programme.title: The Amazing Stunt Kitty
programme.desc: When a big stunt goes awry, Darington is sent flying away on an out-of-control balloon! Now, its up to Blaze, AJ, and Daringtons sidekick Stunt Kitty to save the day!

programme.title: Dino Derby
programme.desc: Today, dinosaur Blaze is teaming up with his prehistoric pal Zeg to compete in... the Dino Derby! But will this dino duo have what it takes to outrace the rest and become Dino Derby champions?

programme.title: Pups Save a School Day / Pups Turn on the Lights
programme.desc: Alex loses his back pack on the first day of school! Ryder and the Paw Patrol need to help him find it. // Its Chases birthday and the pups are planning a surprise party. A storm causes the power to go out!

programme.title: Pups Save a Pool Day / Circus Pup-Formers
programme.desc: Its a hot day and the pups head for the water park - but the pool is empty! Paw Patrol to the rescue. // When the animals dont show up in time for the Circus to start; Ryder and the Paw Patrol step in to help.

programme.title: Legendary Loot / Yup Day
programme.desc: After finding a map to the Legendary Loot, the Shark family splits up to hunt the treasure down. // Baby convinces Daddy to say yup to everything for a day. Whats the worst that could happen?

programme.title: Double Dare You / Roy
programme.desc: On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver. // Barbabright creates a vacuuming robot thats also very good at soccer. The Barbababies organise a match against the robots.

programme.title: Paddingtons Football Dilemma / Paddington Has To Say Goodbye
programme.desc: Paddington has to choose between England and Peru before their football cup match, but he loves both places equally! // The time has come for Aunt Lucy to go home, but theres still time for one last adventure, or is there?

programme.title: The Crew And Skye Build A Mountain Lodge
programme.desc: Skye visits Rubble and Crew from Adventure Bay when their construction project needs some aerial support. But when Speed Meister tries to beat the pups to finish the job, Skye, Rubble, and the rest of the crew jump into rescue mode to save the day!

programme.title: Adventures In Plantsitting / Andrea the Alebrije
programme.desc: Dora and Boots take care of baby flowers Bouncy Blue, Dizzy Daisy, and Baby Rosette so Isa can attend a royal tea party. / Dora and Boots help baby Andrea find the magical leaf so she can receive her Alebrije powers and take care of the rainforest.

programme.title: Sir Blaze and the Unicorn
programme.desc: Witness the return of Sir Blaze and Sir AJ as they embark on an epic quest to free a magical unicorn from an unpoppable bubble!

programme.title: Ants on a Log / Quesadillas
programme.desc: Tiny Chef makes Ants-on-a-Log for a picnic, but has to solve a mystery when the food starts to disappear! // Tiny Chef makes quesadillas but cant get his favorite jar of salsa open no matter how hard he and his friends try!

programme.title: The Secret Password / Monday Funday
programme.desc: The fishy friends find themselves locked out when they cant remember the secret password to get inside their clubhouse. // The Sharks compete in a series of games to see which of them is the Monday Funday Chomp-ion.

programme.title: No Fishes in This School
programme.desc: Its the first day of school, and Sharkdogs not allowed to come; well, thats never stopped him before!

programme.title: Going Wild
programme.desc: When Sharkdogs wild side keeps scaring away the dogs at the dog park, Sharkdog must find his inner calm if he wants to make new friends.

programme.title: A Not So Grand Opening
programme.desc: When Sharkdog accidentally eats the aquariums newest exhibit, Max and the Sharkpack must come up with a plan before Mr. Ceviche, the aquariums owner, catches on.

programme.title: The Fast and The Fishy
programme.desc: Max is determined to win this years obstacle course race, but that may be difficult with Sharkdog always trying to help.

programme.title: Pups Save Their Digi Tal Friends / Pups Save the Rainbow
programme.desc: The Paw Patrol must save the day when two helpful robots take on more than they can handle. // In a dream, Mayor Humdinger finds a Prism that makes rainbows and drains Adventure Bay of color. Its up to the pups to restore color to Adventure Bay.

programme.title: Pups Save Dude Ranch Danny
programme.desc: Daring Danny X takes his horse off the trail and ends up on a wild ride.

programme.title: The Crew And Skye Build A Mountain Lodge
programme.desc: Skye visits Rubble and Crew from Adventure Bay when their construction project needs some aerial support. But when Speed Meister tries to beat the pups to finish the job, Skye, Rubble, and the rest of the crew jump into rescue mode to save the day!

programme.title: Adventures In Plantsitting / Andrea the Alebrije
programme.desc: Dora and Boots take care of baby flowers Bouncy Blue, Dizzy Daisy, and Baby Rosette so Isa can attend a royal tea party. / Dora and Boots help baby Andrea find the magical leaf so she can receive her Alebrije powers and take care of the rainforest.

programme.title: Clock and Dance / Barbapileup
programme.desc: The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamamas birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction. // Three separate stories telescope into a big final bouquet in the middle of the courtyard.

programme.title: The Curse of the Magic Orb / The Wizards Magic Flute
programme.desc: The hamsters crash Harrys school play rehearsal thinking that he is in danger. // The hamsters believe Keeshas flute is making them fall asleep and vow to stop it.

programme.title: Tool Duel
programme.desc: Gabby is the mechanic all the Monster Machines in town count on to fix them up. But when Crusher steals all her tools, Gabby needs Blazes help to get them back!

programme.title: Monster Machine Rescue Team
programme.desc: Blaze must complete three amazing rescues to join the greatest emergency vehicle team in Axle City: the Monster Machine Rescue Team!

programme.title: Pups Save Helga and the Humsquatch / Pups Save the Missing Bone-Stone
programme.desc: Mayor Humdinger is getting dressed for a special day with his Hummy Mummy. // The Museum has a brand-new exhibit: the Emerald Bone-Stone! But when the precious bone goes missing.

programme.title: Pups Save the Butterflies / Pups Save an Underground Chicken
programme.desc: Chickaletta is stuck on a runaway drone and mysterious butterflies are causing chaos all around Adventure Bay! // The statue of Chickaletta has been stolen by Mayor Humdinger and is making its way through Adventure Bays underground tunnel system.

programme.title: Pups and the Kitty-tastrophe
programme.desc: Ryder and the PAW Patrol rescue a lost kitty from the bay, but who will save them from all the mayhem she causes?

programme.title: The Crew Builds Mr. Ducky-Doo A Special Diving Board / The Crew Builds A Rainwater Tank
programme.desc: Mayor Greatway asks Rubble and Crew to build something special for her friend Mr. Ducky-Doo. But soon a construction mystery is afoot... // Rubble and Crew work to build a rain tank for Farmer Zoe before a storm, until a chicken complication crops up.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Skate Park / The Crew Builds A Tunnel
programme.desc: The Crew has a mishap while building a skatepark. // The Crew helps a pop star get her tour bus to town.

programme.title: Rainforest Race / Bok Bok Birthday
programme.desc: Dora and Boots race their boxcar against Croc Racers in the Rainforest Race. / Dora and Boots secretly hand out Big Red Chickens birthday invites to all their friends in time for his birthday party.

programme.title: Deep Dark Disco / Finception
programme.desc: The Sharks help Wavey Jones find his disco ball so he can throw a jaw-some party. // When Hank accidentally takes an important treasure from Swimmy Hall, he goes on a sneaky mission to set things right.

programme.title: Sharkdoghouse
programme.desc: Max needs to create a permanent home for Sharkdog and he knows that his best friends, Olivia and Royce, are just the people to help him.

programme.title: Sharkdog Digs In
programme.desc: Dad desperately wants to win Garden of the Year but when Sharkdog destroys the garden right before judging, the Sharkpack needs to step in and put it all in order.

programme.title: The Great Shark Hunter
programme.desc: Max needs to find more and more fishsticks to keep Sharkdog fed, but his search leads him right into the path of the increasingly suspicious Captain Barb Quigley.

programme.title: The Olden Days
programme.desc: Mummy Pig shows Peppa and her friend Suzy Sheep old photographs from when they were babies. Peppa and Suzy dont remember being that young but are pleased to see that theyve always been best friends.

programme.title: Snowy Mountain
programme.desc: Peppa and her friends are on Snowy Mountain learning how to ski. Their teacher, Madame Gazelle is very good at skiing and was once a world champion! But in the end it is Mummy Pig who impresses everyone...

programme.title: Muddy Puddles
programme.desc: Its raining and Peppa is sad because she cant go out to play. When the rain stops, Peppa feels better and she and George get ready to play one of their favorite games - jumping in mud puddles!

programme.title: Mr Dinosaur is Lost
programme.desc: Georges favourite toy is Mr.Dinosaur. One day Mr.Dinosaur gets stuck up a tree and George thinks he is lost, so Peppa helps George find him.

programme.title: Cranberry Cookies / Snap Pea Stir-Fry
programme.desc: Tiny Chef bakes cookies to welcome a lady bug who moves into the neighborhood. // Tiny Chef makes snap pea stir fry and learns that his friends are good kitchen helpers when he has trouble cooking on his own.

programme.title: Barbabravo Is Not Feeling Well / Be Patient Barbabravo...
programme.desc: Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him. // Barbabravo cant stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long. Barbalala offers to teach him control. Will she succeed?

programme.title: The Seven Foods / The Perfect Portrait
programme.desc: The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he cant create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: Race to Sky High Mountain
programme.desc: At the starting line for Race to Sky High Mountain, one of Crushers cheats threatens to sideline Blaze for good. To get back in this race, Blaze will need... Power Tires!

programme.title: Sparkles Racing Badge
programme.desc: Its more Blaze family fun in this high octane, action-packed adventure as Blaze and his sister Sparkle team up to make it back to the Monster Dome in time for a big race.

programme.title: Pups Save a Super Pup / Pups Save Ryders Robot
programme.desc: Rubble is pretending to be a super pup but gets himself in some trouble. Ryder and the Paw Patrol have to save Rubble! // When Ryders Robot Pup breaks and starts going wild around Adventure Bay, it takes the whole Paw Patrol to help Ryder find it.

programme.title: Pups Save a Monkey / Pups Save a Hoot
programme.desc: When Mandy the monkey escapes from her cage on the train, Ryder and the PAW Patrol are lead on a wild chase! // During a bad wind storm, Ryder and the PAW Patrol have to save an Owl trapped in a blown over tree and reunite her baby.

programme.title: When You Wish Upon a Fish / Shark-Off
programme.desc: Baby and friends set out to climb Wish Mountain and make a wish on the legendary shooting starfish, Ol Sea Breeze. // Shadow challenges Baby Shark to a Shark-Off to prove whos the sharkiest shark.

programme.title: The Grass is Always Greener... / When I Grow Up
programme.desc: Barbabright coats the house in magic product to prevent water leakage. The next day, The house deflates like a balloon. // A bird builds its nest on Barbazoos belly. Barbazoo wants to become a big tree to shelter animals. This becomes complicated.

programme.title: Paddingtons Goo Monster / Paddingtons Apple Pip Adventure
programme.desc: Paddington makes Goo but can he keep his promise to not make a mess when thngs get out of control? // Paddington and Simi go on a magical journey into the human body to see if an apple pip grows into a tree if you swallow one.

programme.title: The Crew Builds Mr. Ducky-Doo A Special Diving Board / The Crew Builds A Rainwater Tank
programme.desc: Mayor Greatway asks Rubble and Crew to build something special for her friend Mr. Ducky-Doo. But soon a construction mystery is afoot... // Rubble and Crew work to build a rain tank for Farmer Zoe before a storm, until a chicken complication crops up.

programme.title: Rainforest Race / Bok Bok Birthday
programme.desc: Dora and Boots race their boxcar against Croc Racers in the Rainforest Race. / Dora and Boots secretly hand out Big Red Chickens birthday invites to all their friends in time for his birthday party.

programme.title: The Construction Contest
programme.desc: To compete in the Axle City Construction Contest, Blaze and his friends turn into construction vehicles! But when Crusher sends them far away, itll take all of their construction skills combined to make it back before time runs out.

programme.title: Mac and Cheese / Potato Stew
programme.desc: Tiny Chef makes rainy day Mac N Cheese but a leaky roof creates chaos in his tree stump kitchen! // Tiny Chef cooks pirate potato stew and uses a treasure map to find the special ingredient

programme.title: The Treat Goblin / Baby Super Shark
programme.desc: Goldie blames her missing treats on a monster. // Vigos plan to turn everyfishy into babies backfires.

programme.title: The Big Picture
programme.desc: Sharkdog is very excited to be in the annual Fisher family photo, but disaster after disaster threatens his perfect picture.

programme.title: Air Sharkdog
programme.desc: When Dennis challenges the Sharkpack to a game of 3-on-3 basketball, Sharkdog reveals hes an amazing player. So amazing, he may end up taking Maxs spot!

programme.title: Sick as a Sharkdog
programme.desc: When Sharkdog comes down with a mysterious cold, Max knows Dad will be able to help him feel better. But things go haywire when the aquariums robot doctor takes over the examination!

programme.title: The Sharkdog Scoop
programme.desc: When Mom is assigned to investigate Sharkdogs wild side for the news, she realizes theres nothing scary about Maxs best friend.

programme.title: Pups Stop a Gold Finding Machine / Pups Help Mayor Humdinger Out of a Jam
programme.desc: The Paw Patrol springs into action when a digging machine goes out-of-control and takes Uncle Otis on a wild ride. // Digi and Tal, try to help Mayor Humdinger but leave the Mayor covered in jam, the Pups must rescue him from hungry animals.

programme.title: Pups Save A Sleepwalking Bear
programme.desc: The pups need to get a sleepwalking bear back home before he wakes up.

programme.title: The Crew Builds Mr. Ducky-Doo A Special Diving Board / The Crew Builds A Rainwater Tank
programme.desc: Mayor Greatway asks Rubble and Crew to build something special for her friend Mr. Ducky-Doo. But soon a construction mystery is afoot... // Rubble and Crew work to build a rain tank for Farmer Zoe before a storm, until a chicken complication crops up.

programme.title: Gardening
programme.desc: Peppa and George enjoy helping Grandpa Pig plant seeds in his garden.

programme.title: Grampy Rabbit in Space
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit visits Peppas playgroup to talk about space rockets. The talk is going very well until suddenly Grampy Rabbit looses his voice. Can Doctor Brown Bear get him talking again?

programme.title: Peppas Circus
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig has put up a tent in his garden. Peppa and her friends decide its a perfect place to put on a circus. With Peppa as the ringmaster, the show can begin!

programme.title: The Fish Pond
programme.desc: Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to see a fish pond he used to visit when he was a little piggy. He is a little surprised to learn that a few things have changed since then.

programme.title: A Longchair for Ron
programme.desc: A sleeping spider squats Rons swing, and he cant take a nap. He laments to Anna and Froga that he wishes he had a deck chair to sleep on. This gives them the idea to surprise him with one.

programme.title: The Key
programme.desc: Because of her fear of spiders, Froga locks herself and Ron in the greenhouse to collecting Strawberries for the friends Strawberry Snack time Musical Feast. But when it is time to leave, she cant locate the key...

programme.title: Popcorn / Banana
programme.desc: Tiny Chef hosts movie night for friends and turns his tree stump into a popcorn machine to pop enough for everyone! // Tiny Chef makes banana toast but after squishing his perfect banana, has to create a brand new dish!

programme.title: Bees Knees Tea
programme.desc: When the Queen Bee comes to a Stump tea party, Chefs determined to put on a party fit for a queen.

programme.title: Tool Duel
programme.desc: Gabby is the mechanic all the Monster Machines in town count on to fix them up. But when Crusher steals all her tools, Gabby needs Blazes help to get them back!
