programme.desc: Lincoln is tired of his sisters meddling in his business until hes being picked on at school. // Lincoln secretly videos his sisters most embarrassing moments in order to win a video contest at school.

programme.title: Papa Times Two / Fake News
programme.desc: Vanity gives one of the Smurfs a makeover to look exactly like Papa Smurf. // Jokey tricks Poet into writing a sensational (but very fake) news story in the Daily Smurf.

programme.title: Youre Fired! / Mirror, Mirror on the Armoire
programme.desc: After another mishap, Clumsy and Dimwitty get into a big fight and vow never to work with each other again. // When Gargamel places a magic armoire in the forest, Vanity must resist the temptation to look into its mirror.

programme.title: Bubbletown / Girls Night Out
programme.desc: SpongeBob visits his old pal Bubble Buddys hometown... Bubbletown! // Sandy invites Karen and Mrs. Puff out for a night on the town, so the ladies decide to blow off some steam.

programme.title: Squirrel Jelly / The String
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick have their peaceful day of jelly fishing disturbed by Sandys competitive nature. // SpongeBob pulls from Squidwards shirt a loose string that never seems to end.

programme.title: Zoo-mergency!
programme.desc: After a zoo fundraiser goes wrong, Sid must save the day with her family!

programme.title: Dance, Dance Resolution / A Fair to Remember
programme.desc: Its the Sadie Hawkins dance at school and Lincolns sisters have accidentally landed him four dates! // When Lincoln and Bobby become friends, Lori sets out to make Bobby jealous by hanging out with Clyde.

programme.title: One of the Boys / A Tattlers Tale
programme.desc: Lincoln wishes he had ten brothers instead of ten sisters, and Lisa gives him a glimpse into that reality. // Lola wants to be a part of the siblings secrets club, but they wont let her in because shes a tattle tale.

programme.title: Gas Station Vacation / Bunny the Barbarian
programme.desc: The Star Family heads to their favorite resort. // Bunny goes on a mid-day adventure to a forgotten age.

programme.title: Jailbreak! / Evil Spatula
programme.desc: An imprisoned Plankton teams up with his fellow inmates to break out of jail and steal the Krabby Patty secret formula. // SpongeBob replaces his broken spatula with one from Plankton, which may or may not have magical powers.

programme.title: Little Smoothie Shop of Horrors / The Great Bat Detective
programme.desc: Wanting to be more like "boss monster" Nefera, Venus overworks and gets in over her head by refusing help. // Bunny Earickson searches for a special pollinating bat in order to locate a companion plant for a wilting Venus.

programme.title: Test Friends
programme.desc: Without them knowing, Captain Man puts Danger Force through a series of tests to see if he can trust them. But when the tests get out of hand, the tables turn on who can be trusted.

programme.title: Twin It to Win It
programme.desc: Captain Man makes twin superheroes, ShoutOut and AWOL, compete over who can catch more criminals using their own ways of crime-fighting.

programme.title: Sweet Dreams Are Made of Cheese
programme.desc: When Lucy and the Morticians Club bring a cursed wheel of cheese into the house Lincoln and Clyde must race to save everyone from their worst nightmares!

programme.title: JAM Session
programme.desc: When Ray hears that Piper is going to Junior Anger Management to work on her anger issues, he makes a wager with Henry that he can make her lose her temper before the night ends.

programme.title: Guess Whos Shopping for Dinner? / New Roomie
programme.desc: Abuela teaches Ronnie Anne that getting ingredients for dinner is no small task. // When Vitos apartment floods, the kids try to find an apartment that suits him best.

programme.title: Mexican Makeover / Uptown Funk
programme.desc: Adelaide and Carl have an adventure on Mr. Changs route, but can they work together to save the day? // When Mama Lupe comes to visit, Abuela tries to get her family at the top of their cultural game.

programme.title: Bo Bo Business / Blunder Party
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and Sid are pumped up for their sleepover, but Carl and Adelaide might ruin the day! // After a disagreement with Abuelo, Bobby goes to work for Mr. Hong to try out his new business ideas.

programme.title: Pat-per Route
programme.desc: Patrick helps Squidward with his newspaper delivery job to compensate for injuring him.

programme.title: A Patty in Time
programme.desc: Patrick time-travels in a race for the Krusty Krabs newest menu item.

programme.title: Mustard O Mine / Shopping List
programme.desc: When The Krusty Krab runs out of mustard, Mr. Krabs sends SpongeBob, Patrick and Squidward to dig up some more! // SpongeBob and Sandy have to collect Krabby Patty ingredients, but Plankton is following their every step.

programme.title: Gown and Out / Breaking Dad
programme.desc: When Lola advances to a regional pageant she worries she could lose for the first time. // Dad has Mr. Grouse watch Lily while he goes to a concert but things quickly start to go wrong

programme.title: Scales of Justice / Crimes of Fashion
programme.desc: When Lana learns her favorite fish are in jeopardy of losing their home to construction she springs into action. // When Leni gets fired from her job due to missing scarves, Lincoln and Clyde (as Ace and Jack) take on the case.

programme.title: Whats Up Watzie? / So Familiar
programme.desc: Frankie doesnt want Watzie to leave for dragon migration, so they amp up the fun to try to convince him to stay. // Draculaura must discover her familiar to open a Witchcraft Codex and hone her powers.

programme.title: The Tennessee Surprise: Love is in the Air
programme.desc: Determined to surprise Charlie, Lincoln and Clyde enter a debate team competition that will take them to Tennessee.

programme.title: Drive Hard
programme.desc: Captain Man and Danger Force are hired to deliver a big budget Hollywood movie to its premiere but the producer warns them that rival studios and internet trolls are out to steal the movie.

programme.title: An Imposter Among Us
programme.desc: Rick Twitler returns with a new plan to control Mikas mind through a spooky VR video game. Its up to Danger Force to exer-cise the Rick Twitler out of Mika before theyre all plunged back into the Dark Ages for good.

programme.title: Cant Spy Me Love
programme.desc: After seeing a cute guy but missing her chance to meet him, Phoebe accesses the Hero Leagues villain search software to track him down. However, Phoebes abuse of power leads to unexpected consequences for her crush that she must prevent

programme.title: Meet the Midknights
programme.desc: When Uncle Budrick is held captive as King Gastleys jester, its up to Max to rescue him from the castles dungeon, with a little help from her newest pals, Simon, Millie, Kevyn, and world-renowned wizard, Mumblin.

programme.title: Back Out There / Spell It Out
programme.desc: Clyde, worried that Lincoln is hung up on Ronnie Anne, decides to try and cure his post-breakup blues. // Tired of her siblings walking all over her, Lucy turns to a spell book once owned by Great Grandma Harriet to teach her siblings a lesson.

programme.title: Fools Paradise / Job Insecurity
programme.desc: With prankster Luan at camp for April Fools Day, the Louds think theyre safe. That is, until they break down in front of an unusual motel. // The kids discover Dad isnt at his IT job anymore and is now a dishwasher.

programme.title: Zoo-mergency!
programme.desc: After a zoo fundraiser goes wrong, Sid must save the day with her family!

programme.title: Kenny the Cat / Yeti Krabs
programme.desc: SpongeBob will do anything to get to meet his newest hero, Kenny The Cat. // Attempting to get more work out of Squidward, Mr. Krabs spins the story of the monstrous Yeti Crab, which eats lazy workers.

programme.title: SpongeBob, Youre Fired!
programme.desc: In order to save money, Mr. Krabs fires SpongeBob. Unable to just "do nothing

programme.title: Lost in Bikini Bottom / Tutor Sauce
programme.desc: SpongeBob tries to take a shortcut to work, but becomes lost along the way. // After failing his drivers test again, Mr. Krabs decides to teach SpongeBob how to drive himself.

programme.title: Squid Plus One / The Executive Treatment
programme.desc: After receiving an invitation to a gallery opening, Squidward scrambles to find a friend to take with him. // While trying to order a special sandwich, Patrick gets swept up in the fast paced world of business.

programme.title: Stair Wars / Enemies a la Mode
programme.desc: Patrick and GrandPat try to pass each other on the stairs, leading to a ludicrous conflict. // The members of the Star family each confront their own absurd rivalries.

programme.title: Lost in Couch / Pat-a-thon
programme.desc: Patrick loses the remote in the cushions, so he journeys into the couch to track it down. // Patrick hosts a telethon to raise money for snails who cant dance.

programme.title: Fuurmergency / Boogey Nightmare
programme.desc: Watzie and Count Fabulous accidentally stumble into the human world and must work together to make it home safe. // Twlya must complete a rite of passage by pursuing a Night Terror through her friends nightmares.

programme.title: Best Fiends / Scareer Day
programme.desc: Draculaura and Toralei are magically stuck together on Ghoul Spirit Day while Clawdeen and Frankie track down a Codex. // On Scareer Day, Heath and his dad Hades must work together to save the school from a swarm of vicious pixies.

programme.title: Slink or Swim / The Big Chill
programme.desc: When Bobby finds out Carl cant swim, he offers to show him the ways of the waves! // After begging Abuelo for some A/C, the cousins decide to earn some cash at the neighborhood fair.

programme.title: Karma Chameleon / Team Effort
programme.desc: The Changs go on vacation, leaving Ronnie Anne and her cousins to look after Cam, the chameleon snake. // Ronnie Anne and her skate buddies work together to show their coach they can make a good team.

programme.title: Between a Roach and a Hard Place
programme.desc: When Dylan compromises his vision for fame and fortune, he may disappointment the most important person; himself. Rebecca learns that staying true to yourself is more important than anything.

programme.title: Badika
programme.desc: Anika is noticeably different now shes Badika but will the others realise theres anything wrong? Oliver, Jasmyn and Florian skip out on their house chores to visit Orphans Inc and get an unexpected lead on the missing Jacksons.

programme.title: Treasure Map
programme.desc: Taylor meets a gold prospector with half of a treasure map of Rock Island. With Uncle Charlies journal warning that Rock Islands gold must never be removed, Taylors determined to protect it, but an aggressive swarm of bees disrupt her plans.

programme.title: The Fun Bucket / The Patrick Show After Dark
programme.desc: The Stars celebrate Patricks birthday at the Chum Bucket. // Patrick and Squidina explore Bikini Bottom late at night.

programme.title: Swimming Fools / The Goobfather
programme.desc: SpongeBob builds a pool in his backyard and Squidward tries to resist taking a dip. // Mr. Krabs must reckon with the Goobfather after he adds "Patty Whips" to the menu at the Krusty Krab.

programme.title: SquidBird / Allergy Attack!
programme.desc: Squidward gets left with a mess when SpongeBob and Patrick use carrier clams to send messages to each other. // After cooking his kazillionth Krabby Patty, SpongeBob believes hes developed an allergy to them.

programme.title: First Aid Last Aid / Night of the Living Stench
programme.desc: Camp Master Krabs finally hires a camp nurse, but she needs to dedicate all her time and effort to keeping SpongeBob safe. // When all the campers try to win the Stinkiest Camp in the Forest award, Squidward has to fend for his life to stay clean.

programme.title: Who Nose? / Clumsy Not Clumsy
programme.desc: Hefty casts a spell which accidentally turns him into a colossal nose that sucks up everything in its path! // After catching Clumsy, Gargamel tempts him with a magic amulet that makes his clumsiness disappear.

programme.title: Unsmurfable Smile / Mind the Cat
programme.desc: Smurfette and Blossom try to make Grouchy smile by taking him on a camping trip. // Gargamel falls under the mind control of Azrael and the Smurfs must help to set him free.

programme.title: Guess Whos Shopping for Dinner? / New Roomie
programme.desc: Abuela teaches Ronnie Anne that getting ingredients for dinner is no small task. // When Vitos apartment floods, the kids try to find an apartment that suits him best.

programme.title: Mexican Makeover / Uptown Funk
programme.desc: Adelaide and Carl have an adventure on Mr. Changs route, but can they work together to save the day? // When Mama Lupe comes to visit, Abuela tries to get her family at the top of their cultural game.

programme.title: Bo Bo Business / Blunder Party
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and Sid are pumped up for their sleepover, but Carl and Adelaide might ruin the day! // After a disagreement with Abuelo, Bobby goes to work for Mr. Hong to try out his new business ideas.

programme.title: Appointment TV / Karens Virus
programme.desc: The long-lost episode of Mermaid Man is finally showing on TV, but will SpongeBob make it home in time to watch? // Karen gets a computer virus, and its up to SpongeBob to get it out of her!

programme.title: Bubbletown / Girls Night Out
programme.desc: SpongeBob visits his old pal Bubble Buddys hometown... Bubbletown! // Sandy invites Karen and Mrs. Puff out for a night on the town, so the ladies decide to blow off some steam.

programme.title: Squirrel Jelly / The String
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick have their peaceful day of jelly fishing disturbed by Sandys competitive nature. // SpongeBob pulls from Squidwards shirt a loose string that never seems to end.

programme.title: No Pictures, Please
programme.desc: Patrick leads an enthusiastic stranger on a tour of his favorite places in Bikini Bottom.

programme.title: Shrinking Stars / FitzPatrick
programme.desc: The Star family finds themselves getting smaller and smaller. // Patricks evil twin cousin shows up to ruin Patrick reputation.

programme.title: How to Train Your Carl
programme.desc: Carl gets lost in the city zoo after sneaking away from his family, in search of Keyon, the Komodo dragon.

programme.title: The Golden Curse
programme.desc: The Casagrandes celebrate Pacos wedding, but they need to find las arras that Sergio lost!

programme.title: Driving Miss Hazy / No Guts, No Glori
programme.desc: Tired of doing favors to get a ride from Lori, Lincoln decides its time to help Leni pass her drivers test. // Lincoln conspires with the rest of his sisters to overthrow Loris tyranny as their babysitter.

programme.title: The Sweet Spot / A Tale of Two Tables
programme.desc: Lincoln devises a plan to get the best seat in the car for a long, family, road trip. // Lincoln tries to prove hes mature enough to have dinner at the adult table, leaving the kiddie table behind him.

programme.title: Smurfing Places / Poet Slam
programme.desc: Gargamel switches bodies with Papa Smurf and only Timid knows the truth. Will he be brave enough to speak up? // After Poet mentors Lily in rhyming, he experiences "poet block" during the poet slam contest.

programme.title: Say Smurf for the Camera!/Manners Matter
programme.desc: Handy invents a camera so Painter can make portraits of all the villages inhabitants. // Papa Smurf is nervous about the new Nature Fairy coming to visit so he asks Willow to teach the Smurfs manners.

programme.title: FarmerBob / Gary and Spot
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick work a day on Old Man Jenkins farm, much to his dismay. // Sandy narrates the nocturnal adventures of Gary and his secret pal - Spot.

programme.title: The Nitwitting / The Ballad of Filthy Muck
programme.desc: Patrick inducts SpongeBob into his prestigious society of dullards and doofuses. // Patrick takes his grime to a new extreme, playing around in so much trash that he becomes unrecognizable.

programme.desc: When Sancho gets himself into trouble in the city, Sergio helps him become a model pet! // Worried that Lori may have a new crush, Bobby visits her in college and tries to impress her with his golf skills.

programme.title: Funny Business / Snow Bored
programme.desc: Lincoln becomes Luans clown assistant but starts hogging the spotlight. // The Loud kids set out to show Lisa what is fun about a snow day.

programme.desc: After seeing a scary movie (that his parents told him not to), Lincoln cant go to sleep and pulls an all-nighter. // When a common cold ravages through the loud house, Lincoln believes his sisters have turned into Zombies!

programme.title: To Dad and Back / Survivoring
programme.desc: Patrick ventures inside Cecil to learn how the body works. // Cecil takes his kids camping, but Squidina wants the drama of reality TV.

programme.desc: Mr. Krabs gets trapped in Bikini Bottoms brand-new bank, and its up to SpongeBob and Patrick to save him. // After failing again to steal the Krabby Patty formula, Plankton gets a pet to cheer himself up.

programme.title: The Monstering
programme.desc: Human girl, Clawdeen, follows her instincts and discovers Monster High!/When Clawdeen isnt allowed into Monster High because shes human, she devises other ways to get into school

programme.title: Monsty
programme.desc: When Mika tries too hard to win Mans Nest Employee of The Month, she creates a monster that could ruin the telethon Danger Force is hosting.

programme.title: Radioactive Cat
programme.desc: Boses Mom, Celia, picks up Schwozs lost radioactive cat from outside SW.A.G. and takes it home, so Danger Force and Captain Man have to try and get it back before she goes nuclear.

programme.title: Spelling and Doorbelling
programme.desc: Lincoln and Clyde find themselves outmatched in the ultimate prank war, meanwhile Lisa takes on a new "sport" with some help from Lynn Jr.

programme.title: Green Fingers
programme.desc: After Schwoz creates a disease that accidentally effects Charlotte, Henry, his family, and even Ray, he quarantines them in Henrys house in order to find a cure.

programme.title: Cursed!
programme.desc: Celebrity psychic Ernesto Estrella deems Great Lakes City to be bad luck and Abuela believes him!

programme.desc: After a magician hypnotizes Bobby into thinking hes a cat, the family needs to snap him out of it! // Ronnie Anne and her friends uncover a town mystery: what happened to Brunos hot dog cart?

programme.desc: Carls love for toys gets him caught up in a whirlwind toy review career. // Fridas art gets a bad review, the kids try to stage a new auction to lift her spirits.

programme.desc: In the midst of a typical day of scavenging, the Dartfish family discovers a thief in the Star home.

programme.title: Pat-per Route
programme.desc: Patrick helps Squidward with his newspaper delivery job to compensate for injuring him.

programme.desc: Frankie bottles up their feelings after not making the fearleading team and causes unintended electrical outbursts. // After misguided efforts, Clawd learns that being a good, older brother means more than just protecting his sister.

programme.title: Last Friend Standing

programme.title: A Danger Among Us
programme.desc: After Miles has a vision that Rick Twitler is still around, Danger Force travels deep into the Mans Nests to find him, running into an old foe along the way.

programme.title: Future Tense / Lynner Takes All
programme.desc: When Mom and Dad meet an impressive family they worry their kids arent doing enough to ensure successful futures. // Tired of Lynns poor sportsmanship during board games, the siblings decide to team up to take her down.

programme.title: Yes Man / Friend or Faux
programme.desc: The sisters enlist the "Master of Convincing" (AKA Lincoln) to teach them how to ask Mom and Dad for money. // Lisa gets her report card and finds shes failed social skills. To bring up her grade, she must make a friend.

programme.desc: GrandPat prevents his precious memories from being sold at a family yard sale.

programme.desc: After agreeing to go to The Royal Woods House of Terror, Linc and Clyde have to toughen up and face their fears. // Lola discovers Lucy has an old, fragile doll and decides she must borrow it - no matter what Lucy says.

programme.title: Creepover Party / Creature Clash
programme.desc: Draculaura, Clawdeen and Frankie meet Twyla, a boogey monster, while having a sleepover in the library. // Frankie, fascinated by Kumas scaritage, does a ritual unsupervised causing trouble for all Monster Highs undead students!

programme.title: Nice Guys Finish First
programme.desc: Lincoln has a crush on Lynns new best friend, Zia, and the only thing stopping him from asking her out is... Lynn. In a series of trials and tribulations, Lincoln tries to prove to Lynn that hes worthy of dating Zia.

programme.title: A Henry Among Us
programme.desc: After Volt and ShoutOut are kidnapped by Cyborg Rick Twitler, Henry Hart returns from Dystopia in an attempt to save his friends and stop the anti-internet cyborg for good.

programme.title: Dude, Wheres My Man Buggy?
programme.desc: When Danger Force borrows Rays beloved Man Buggy without permission it falls into the hands of criminals Stupid Jeff and The Toddler. Now the team must track it down and get it back before Ray finds out.

programme.title: Aunt Misbehavin
programme.desc: Max and Phoebe give their mom the ultimate birthday surprise by tracking down her long lost sister, but the gift goes awry when they discover these sisters have been feuding for years.

programme.title: Escape from Byjovia
programme.desc: As King Gastley searches the kingdom for Max and the others, Max and the Midknights learn about a prophecy and devise a plan to escape from Byjovia to find the missing King Conrad.

programme.title: No Laughing Matter / No Spoilers
programme.desc: When Luan overhears her siblings complaining about her comedy, she decides to give it up. // Knowing Lenis history of spoiling surprises, the kids dont tell her about Moms upcoming party.

programme.title: Legends / Mall of Duty
programme.desc: Dad and Lincoln get on "Legends of the Hidden Temple" and cant wait to for a whole day of father/son bonding. // Lincoln wants to go to the mall but has to watch his younger sisters so he decides to take them to the mall.

programme.title: Lalo Land / Maybe-Sitter
programme.desc: The Casagrandes prepare Lalo for his big audition to be Phoebe Powers new canine sidekick! // With the adults out for the night, Bobby and Carlota take turns watching the kids - and going to a party!

programme.title: The Fishbowl / Married to Money
programme.desc: Sandy tries to study SpongeBob and Patricks behavior, but her science experiment goes horribly awry. // Mr. Krabs takes Planktons advice, and finally marries the only thing he ever loved...money!

programme.title: Mall Girl Pearl / Two Thumbs Down
programme.desc: Pearl gets a job to be cool like her friends, but the only store thats hiring is the lamest store at the mall! // SpongeBob loses the use of his thumbs, and must get them back in working order before his entire life falls apart.

programme.title: Sharks vs. Pods / CopyBob DittoPants
programme.desc: The Sharks are the toughest guys in town, but their next confrontation might be too much for SpongeBob to handle. // Plankton clones SpongeBob in an effort to steal Krabs secret formula, but original Bob might ruin his plans.

programme.title: Sold! / Lame and Fortune
programme.desc: When SpongeBob and Patrick think their homes have been sold, they move away - much to Squidwards delight. // When fortune cookies start predicting the future, Plankton realizes he can twist them to his own evil schemes.

programme.desc: The bright and early morning news programme. Reports cover financial news, daily headlines from China, Hong Kong and Taiwan newspapers, as well as world weather forecasts.

programme.title: Premium Spectacular
programme.desc: Premium Spectacular plays host to a variety of special programmes showcasing historical, cultural, social and musical events from around the world.

programme.title: News On The Hour (9/12/24)
programme.desc: News On The Hour provides coverage of news and current affairs from around the world - concise, speedy and accurate - keeping viewers informed of the latest breaking news each hour.

programme.title: Dreamscapes, Architectural Wonders
programme.desc: From simple residential cottages to impressive royal mansions and magnificent skyscrapers, this programme presents the great works of architecture and how they inspire us in various ways.

programme.title: Summary Of Press (9/12/24)
programme.desc: Providing a concise review of whats in the press, the show highlights the important news by presenting newspaper headlines and editorial from respected publications.

programme.title: Phoenix Midday Express (9/12/24)
programme.desc: Presenting the most updated international and financial news breaking before lunch, viewers can tune in to stay informed about events happening around the world.

programme.title: We Are One
programme.desc: This documentary-style programme tells the touching stories of special bonds between humans and animals.

programme.title: Phoenix Super Doctors
programme.desc: This programme is hosted by Chinese traditional and western medicine experts as well as the very first "Intelligent Doctor". A top medical expert will also be invited to interpret in-depth buzz health topics.

programme.title: Celebrity Face To Face
programme.desc: Celebrity Face To Face brings viewers up close and personal with famous and glamorous figures to discover their personalities and what makes them special.

programme.title: News On The Hour (9/12/24)
programme.desc: News On The Hour provides coverage of news and current affairs from around the world - concise, speedy and accurate - keeping viewers informed of the latest breaking news each hour.

programme.title: China Insight
programme.desc: Each episode of China Insight features a foreigner who travels around China to observe the current situation of Chinese society, and the life of Chinese people from his perspective.

programme.title: The Great Era
programme.desc: Bringing you high-quality documentaries produced in conjunction with Chinas top satellite TV and production institutions.

programme.title: Top View
programme.desc: This commentary programme focuses on a hot spot every week, using satellite maps as a means of demonstration and in-depth analysis of major power strategies.

programme.title: Summary Of Press (9/12/24)
programme.desc: Providing a concise review of whats in the press, the show highlights the important news by presenting newspaper headlines and editorial from respected publications.

programme.title: Phoenix Focus (9/12/24)
programme.desc: Phoenix Focus is a live daily news programme featuring coverage of current affairs, finance, social issues, culture, entertainment and sport. Phoenix Focus provides an in-depth review and thorough reporting on daily events.

programme.title: Constricted
programme.desc: A romantic date ends with a teenager fighting for her life in the hospital; Carisi cant help bringing the case home with him as he envisions the dangers ahead for his growing daughters.

programme.title: Economics Of Shame
programme.desc: When a TV reporter becomes the victim of sextortion that could ruin her career, Benson helps her take back control while Velasco goes undercover as a potential rich target.

programme.title: Roschach
programme.desc: Agent Clay consults with Benson when a woman is found gravely injured at a remote campground and the suspect could be anywhere along the Eastern Seaboard; Bruno and Silva take a chance on an odd hunch to see if it becomes a lead.

programme.title: Tenfold
programme.desc: Bruno must get to the center of a victim’s incomplete story to track down a serial rapist. Carisi is helpless to stop a crime he suspects is about to be committed.

programme.title: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
programme.desc: Four nice, but petty criminals find themselves heavily in debt to a murderous London gangster after a crooked card game. To cover their debts and literally save their skins, they decide to rob a bunch of thugs who have just robbed a group of pot growers.

programme.title: Margots Story
programme.desc: A widow is on trial after a relationship with a dance instructor goes too far.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon S12

programme.desc: Emmy and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings his unique high-energy comedy to the storied 60-year NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers S12
programme.desc: Late Night with Seth Meyers is executive produced by the Emmy Award-winning Lorne Michaels and is home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and the best in musical talent.

programme.title: Hardboiled
programme.desc: Torres receives intel from a confidential informant regarding top secret naval information thats at risk of being sold.

programme.title: Crunch
programme.desc: A troubled video game designer and her team find themselves in bizarre circumstances which mirror the videogame they have created. Trapped in a toxic building, she must help her colleagues escape. It’s no longer a game.

programme.title: Down The Rabbit Hole
programme.desc: Jaz, Errol, Dom and Caspar begin to test the shifting boundaries of their own and others psychosis. Aroundthem, the building assumes a malevolent life of its own.

programme.title: Wonderland
programme.desc: Eddie and Denny engineer another classic game-play staple: A race-against time for a life hanging in thebalance. Jaz determines they will pass that test, win that race, save that life. An unlikely source thinksotherwise.

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers S12
programme.desc: Late Night with Seth Meyers is executive produced by the Emmy Award-winning Lorne Michaels and is home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and the best in musical talent.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon S12
programme.desc: Emmy and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings his unique high-energy comedy to the storied 60-year NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: Justins Story
programme.desc: A wrestling coach is accused of inappropriate actions.

programme.title: Margots Story
programme.desc: A widow is on trial after a relationship with a dance instructor goes too far.

programme.title: Around The World In 80 Days
programme.desc: It is 1872, and a British inventor, a Chinese thief and a French artist set off to circumnavigate the globe in 80 days. They travel by land, air, sea, and in-line skates in order to beat the clock and finish where they started.

programme.title: Hardboiled
programme.desc: Torres receives intel from a confidential informant regarding top secret naval information thats at risk of being sold.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon S12
programme.desc: Emmy and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings his unique high-energy comedy to the storied 60-year NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers S12
programme.desc: Late Night with Seth Meyers is executive produced by the Emmy Award-winning Lorne Michaels and is home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and the best in musical talent.

programme.title: Maxine
programme.desc: Maxine Carr moves to Soham for a fresh start with her boyfriend Ian Huntley.

programme.title: Maxine
programme.desc: Maxine is informed that Ian has been charged with the abduction and murder of the girls.

programme.title: Deadline
programme.desc: James Alden is a washed-up journalist making trashy documentaries when he lands the interview of the decade. Natalie Varga is suspected of murdering her rich Hungarian husband and she makes James an offer - find the killer and shell give him the exclusive everyone wants.

programme.title: Deadline
programme.desc: Oliver went on the run after borrowing from drug dealers in Budapest. Mrs Molnar provides a Hungarian police file which implicates him in another murder attempt. Hes officially dead from a drugs overdose and their mother identified the body.

programme.title: View From The Top
programme.desc: A small-town woman tries to achieve her goal of becoming a flight attendant.

programme.title: Sea Morning Show (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Morning Show delivers up to-date news, live reports, talk shows and features about Indonesia and also Southeast Asia which airs daily 6 - 9 am.

programme.title: Secret For A Healthy Life
programme.desc: A program that tells the inspiring story of a healthy life practitioner who has experienced a history of illness. He or she will share stories about their journey and also their secrets to fighting to heal or survive.

programme.title: Wellness Stories
programme.desc: Inspires people to relate to the emotion of the moment. Captures the wellness of life and the excitement of doing a healthy lifestyle. Spread spirit and happiness. Wellness is related to local wisdom too.

programme.title: Dr Lisa To The Rescue S1
programme.desc: Emergency vet Dr. Lisa Chimes ventures out of the surgery room to raise awareness about animal welfare in this compassionate pet rescue series. Lisas mission is to encourage potential pet owners to adopt rescue animals from shelters rather than support puppy mills or backyard breeders.

programme.title: Vet Tales
programme.desc: Follow the daily ups and downs of two enthusiastic and entertaining New Zealand veterinarians - Dr Mark Young and Dr Stacey Tremain. These long-time friends graduated vet school together 20 years ago. Mark is now a rural vet working with large animals and Stacey works in a busy animal hospital dealing with smaller patients.

programme.title: Animalpedia
programme.desc: A program for animal lovers. Everything you need to know about each animal that will be featured in this program.

programme.title: The Animal Library
programme.desc: A program about animals. Not only about pets, but also discuss about the types of care, and also the costs incurred as well as the uniqueness.

programme.title: The Shelter
programme.desc: Documentary series about the lives of rescue animals in animal shelters. The sad and dark stories of animals that have to end up in shelters, the struggles of protectors of abandoned animals, the behavior of animals that are sometimes funny and sometimes chaotic, to the happy stories of those who finally have new homes and parents.

programme.title: Sea Today Business (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Today Business delivers up to-date news and live reports about global stock markets.

programme.title: Exploring Nusantara With Kristian Hansen
programme.desc: Showcasing spectacular journey like youve never seen it before! Join with Kristian Hansen on non-stop journey one of Asias most exotic and breath-taking nations Indonesia. Crossingmotorcycle journey from Sabang to Merauke to show you historic, cultural, people and insights alongside tantalising food and drinks, this show will inspire you and learn more about Indonesia.

programme.title: Tough Boats
programme.desc: A brand new series that explores some of the most fascinating and hard-core boat journeys on the planet. In this mini series we undertake epic journeys by boats in some of the toughest environments on earth. During our journeys we look at how the technology of boat travel has been adapted to survive, trade with and connect isolated communities.

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: Travel Quest is an eco travel adventure series showcasing some of the most exciting, exotic and often dangerous places in earth Host Bill Ball, a true " challenges himself in each episode as he attempts to check an adventure, thrill or rare animal off his personal bucket list Tracking jaguars, diving with sharks, climbing cliffs in Africa, photographing gorillas, bicycling across the Serengeti and finding cannibals on remote and forbidden islands are all part of his Travel Quest

programme.title: Epic Trails
programme.desc: Epic Trails is a visually stunning and inspiring television series that follows wilderness adventurer, Eric Hanson, on his journey to discover the worlds most amazing trails Each 30 minute episode follows Eric on one of his world travels taking viewers on breathtaking adventures while sharing unique stories of the places and the people Eric encounters along the way

programme.title: Sustainable Living
programme.desc: Providing inspiration that there is a different "Way of life". Some call it slow living, living off-grid. However, in this show, we describe it as self sustainable living. Providing inspiration to the audience that shows how lucky the Indonesian people are to live in a very generous land.

programme.title: Living In Harmony
programme.desc: Living in Harmony is a program about comfortable living homes designed according to the character of the owner. We believe that every home is ideal for its owner, hence every home has a different feel.

programme.title: Green Living
programme.desc: Green Living is a program explores the life of gardening, both small and large scale. Gardening isa fun thing and can be a promising profession. Planters usually own large areas of land, and have patterns and ways to develop their natural products. They will then sell these natural products, in a simple way, which is beneficial for all people.

programme.title: 3-Hour News Show (Live)
programme.desc: 3 Hour News Show is one of our flagship programs which airs daily 4 - 7 PM, this program have a CEO Talk segment where the guest star is the CEO of various reputable companies.

programme.title: Hungry Hour
programme.desc: Street food is not just a matter of taste but also a story. Culinary recommendations that are delicious and suitable for anyone.

programme.title: World Of Durian
programme.desc: A program that will review all types of durian typical of the archipelago, starting from the history, taste and specialty of each durian.

programme.title: Stories Of Taste
programme.desc: Stories of Taste will provide a new perspective about the taste of unique cuisines across the cities in Indonesia. Take an in-depth look at the struggles and history of the owners in building and creating great food or restaurants.

programme.title: Crave
programme.desc: A culinary program that finds out what makes celebrities crave fancy food like prata, grilled meat, sushi, satay, ice cream and even a big English breakfast.

programme.title: Apose S1
programme.desc: APOSE: ANAK PODCAST SEJATI tells the story of a podcasters work life both on air and behind the scenes. In this series, there is a star podcaster who will interview a number of sources who will be present at the office.

programme.title: Pridelands Safari
programme.desc: Join Brent Leo Smith and his amazing collegues for highlights from their exciting facinating adventures on the pridelands conservancy in the greater Kruger National Part, South Africa.

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: Climate change is more than a set of abstract projections and statistics. Its the daily reality for millions of people across the world, living on the frontlines of the climate crisis. The Longest Day is a snapshot of the climate crisis in action - told through the voices of farmers, health workers, city residents and displaced families.

programme.title: The World From Above
programme.desc: The second series of The World from Above flies across some of the most beautiful and dramatic places in the world. In this series, we float over Venice, find four US presidents carved into the rock at Mount Rushmore, circle over twenty chateaux in the Loire Valley and fly up the Danube to find an enormous temple dedicated to Valhalla.

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: Trail Town: Down Under
programme.desc: This family-friendly travel show is dedicated to cycling and the great outdoors, and to encouraging more families, couples and friends to explore the world on bicycle.Jump on for the ride of a lifetime as we explore the cycle trails, mountain bike parks, natural beauty and cuisine that Australia and New Zealand has to offer.

programme.title: Pridelands Safari
programme.desc: Join Brent Leo Smith and his amazing collegues for highlights from their exciting facinating adventures on the pridelands conservancy in the greater Kruger National Part, South Africa.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.desc: Olive, Petole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: The magical branches
programme.desc: Olive, Petole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Secret presents
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: It isnt me
programme.desc: Whenever an animal is stressed or bothered about something, they head straight to see Claude the bull. Well-known as a doctor for minor ills, he is particularly skilled in soothing everyday troubles and resolving misunderstandings. With Claudes help, the animals learn to love themselves as they are: imperfect.

programme.title: For the best
programme.desc: Nicky meets up with his father, who she still loves even if the mutant lifestyle is hard to accept. Meanwhile, Zoe must convince Alex not to damage the barn.

programme.title: Vendee Globe 2024
programme.desc: Daily summary of the 10th Vendee Globe, non-stop solo sailing race around the world with no assistance. The skippers cover around 45,000 km crossing the world, passing the Cape of Good Hope, Cape Leeuwin and Cape Horn. Arrival and departure: Les Sables dOlonne.

programme.title: Gnocchi with Swiss chard
programme.desc: The cuisine of southern France takes centre stage once again! On the menu: gnocchi with Swiss chard and rosti from Ardeche.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Temps Present
programme.desc: Temps Present tackles current events broadly speaking. With its in-depth investigations and critical vision, the programme sheds light on the crises and the conflicts of our time, while denouncing the malfunctions of our society.

programme.title: Tv5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: La Vie Revee Des Autres
programme.desc: Franck and Karine abandon everything to settle in the mountains. On their arrival, their chalet isnt available. The property developers offer them an alternative, but its far from being what they wanted. Little by little, bitterness and jealousy take hold, poisoning their relationship, until the irreparable happens.

programme.title: Life Made Simple
programme.desc: TING SHEUNG WONG (KWOK CHUN ON) is a 30 years old man with the IQ of a seven years old boy. Ironically, he is surely happier than anyone else._x000D__x000D_WONG’s simple life ends when his best friend from childhood, WONG KEI FUNG CATHERINE (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER), goes to the U.S. to study. In order to realise FUNG’s dream of studying abroad, WONG gives her all his savings. She works at the Chung’s International Company Limited after her study.

programme.title: My Ages Apart
programme.desc: Mentor and mentee, SUNG CHUNG-KEI (Bobby Au Yeung) and KWONG KONG-SANG (Moses Chan), are highly-regarded bankers. To move up the corporate ladder, KONG-SANG deliberately transfers CHUNG-KEI out, but the plane CHUNG-KEI takes crashes. After regaining his consciousness, CHUNG-KEI finds himself trapped in the body of a millennial named BAO PAU (James Ng).

programme.title: The Sky is the Limit
programme.desc: CHOW KWOK CHING (Lam Bowie) was a disorderly guy with no ambitions. Though he was in his thirties, he did not have a career and changed jobs constantly. Under his mother’s pressure, CHING determined to join the police force. He did not do his work very well and finally was assigned to Sha Tau Kok where the border is. Meanwhile, CHING had misunderstanding with a mainland girl KAM LAN (Cheung Ho Yee, Maggie). He even perceived LAN as a bad woman and considered her as a sign of misfortune to him.

programme.title: Discover New Taiwan Step By Step
programme.desc: The creative production team goes around Taiwan in search of inspiring stories in the country. Get to know more unique individuals and discover the true spirit of Taiwan.

programme.title: Beauty Lab
programme.desc: Beauty Lab is a program that blends "beauty" and "fashion." From exclusive tours of celebrity homes to introducing style tips from fashion gurus, guides to purchasing luxury handbags, celebrity-favorite shops, honest reviews of trending beauty products, and must-know seasonal discount strategies, the show ensures you stay effortlessly updated on the latest trends.

programme.title: Battle ATM
programme.desc: Creating a brand-new interactive ATM that combined with puzzle solving and daily life! Guests can win money by taking three rounds of intellectual challenges from the ATM, turn wisdom into money!

programme.title: Super Taste: 48 Hour Burning Desire!
programme.desc: Super Taste focuses on funny travel style to discover destinations and local-dishes. Standing on audiences view point, programs hosts introduce every sightseeing sites with close-witness, young and humorous way to announce the spirits of Super Taste.

programme.title: Focus World News
programme.desc: A news programme that provides the latest international and Taiwan news, as well as in-depth analyses of important issues around the world.

programme.title: All About Health
programme.desc: How well do you know your body? What should you eat to be healthy and energetic? Are health tips available online reliable? Tune in to this programme as the hosts give you all the answers!
